Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire! It has everything I need.I also love the fact that I choose what my stepdaughter plays and for how long so she isn't duck to the screen all day long. I have not had an issue with my kindle at all.it was everything I expected and more. I have quite a few games and a few books and misc apps.I love it. I highly recommend this for anyone who is wanting a tablet like device and also enjoys reading. I didn't want to pay an arm and a leg for a tablet and I really love to read do the kindle fire is perfect for me. I can't say enough how much I love my kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: BEST THING I'VE BOUGHT IN A LONG TIME
Reviews.Author: puddles
Reviews.Content: I LOVE EVERYTHING ABOUT IT !!!!  SO EASY TO SLIP IN MY PURSE FOR WHEN I'M WAITING ON APPOINTMENTS, CAN READ IN BED AND NOT BOTHER MY HUSBAND BY HAVING A LIGHT ON.  GRANDKIDS LOVE IT TOO.

Reviews.Title: I love the Kindle Fire HD!
Reviews.Author: Xiomara W.
Reviews.Content: I just simply love this Kindle.  It does so much.  And the apps available are more than I imagined.  I was not happy that I couldn't transfer my notebook notes from my Kindle Keyboard, but then I got the Evernote app and I'm quite pleased with that purchase...although it was free!  I am still finding my way around the Kindle Fire HD, but that's normal for me as I am not a tech person.

Reviews.Title: Kindle is a must have
Reviews.Author: Gamer "Family Gamer"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle and don't know how I survived without it.  I use it ofcourse for reading books/magzines, Facebook, e-mail, games and watching amazon instant movies.  Just ordered 2 more.  One for my Son and one for my Wife.

Reviews.Title: Background pic
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The only thing that I have noticed that I would like to be able to do is set my pictures to my background.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD review
Reviews.Author: Sue Ward
Reviews.Content: I would have given this product a five but I  don't like the charging connector.  It is very difficult to connect and I am afraid that it will eventually cease to work like my other Kindle Fires did.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Katiejay "Kat"
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting a Fire every since I got my Kindle keyboard. I am slowly wearing them out I read them everyday.

Reviews.Title: Great first tablet
Reviews.Author: Pristine Aericko
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my new Kindle. I wish you could put wallpapers on the home/desktop and I am only getting to stay up for about 3 hours before it runs out of life and has to be charged again. Not seeing the time of 8 hours plus that was mentioned in the ads about Kindle Fire. But it's still a cool first tablet. Enjoying the apps too. :)

Reviews.Title: amazing features
Reviews.Author: Lori A. Walker "arlothedog"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Kindle just for the ability to download video content and watch it without wifi connection. It has been a fantastic feature, I do wish I had gotten the larger memory but at least I am able to enjoy some movies or tv when I'm stuck at home where I am forced to live without Internet.

Reviews.Title: Love it, but....
Reviews.Author: Kathy Warren
Reviews.Content: Don't get me wrong this would have been a 5 star rating if there hadn't been a line that appeared across my kindle less than 30 days of receiving it.However, when I called customer service they replaced it, shipped the new one overnight and instructed me to return the defective one once I got my replacement.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle.
Reviews.Author: Joe H Stanley
Reviews.Content: This is the first Kindle that I have owned and now that I have a Kindle, I wonder why it took me so long to purchase one. There are hundreds of free books - if not thousands - available for the Kindle. There is also a lot of free music and apps. This is not just a book reader, but a tablet, MP3 Player, book reader and so much more! The books are easy to read even for an old guy with poor eyesight and you can adjust the print size. The book reader works pretty well also and the built in speakers have a surprisingly good sound. I love my new Kindle! In fact, I love my Kindle so much I am planning on buying my wife and daughter a Kindle for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: 5th Kindle
Reviews.Author: joyce nelson
Reviews.Content: Problem when I first received  after daughter found turn off on voice activation, no problem after that, was concerned that we needed a credit card but it takes any credit card, so wasn't a problem after put on a prepaid on it, in fact Amazon/Kindle suggested the prepaid credit card if you didn't have one or didn't want to use your own bank card.this is my 5th Kindle and I love the devices.

Reviews.Title: kindles are great.
Reviews.Author: jrrider
Reviews.Content: i bought for my oldest granddaughter and she loves it. i have now bought one for all grandkids from 15 to 4 and they love them. how ever if i had known that new ones would be coming out i would have waited to get the new ones.

Reviews.Title: Kindle is my very favorite!
Reviews.Author: Connie Altic
Reviews.Content: Enjoy the ease of checking e-mail and Facebook as well as reading a good book!!!! Holds a charge and easily travels...

Reviews.Title: Easy to use.  Great graphics. So many uses!
Reviews.Author: Rockymeadow
Reviews.Content: This is one amazing tablet!  Easy enough for a "senior citizen" to enjoy.  Beautiful graphics.Clear, easy to read and navigate.

Reviews.Title: it's fun.
Reviews.Author: shotgun "DOUG"
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle except for the fact that the charger plug goes bad after some time then you no longer are able to charge  it. By this Im talking about the plug on the kindle not the charger wire.the other thing is no way to use it for any apps that require internet unless your near a WiFi it would be nice if it worked like a cell phone.

Reviews.Title: Reflections and Sunlight Limit Its Usefulness
Reviews.Author: Jack Knight
Reviews.Content: If you never had to use it in the sunlight or in rooms with overhead lights, it was wonderful.  However, like many cell phones, you can't see it in bright sun.  It reflects pretty much like a mirror if you're trying to read with lights overhead.  Operationally, I really liked it.

Reviews.Title: Great gift for a friend or yourself
Reviews.Author: Michele Floam
Reviews.Content: I had a lepan tablet that never seemed to work well and needed something new to do email, facebook and read my kindle books.  The Kindel became and attractive option because the cost was significantly less than other tablets on the market.So for the most part I am extremely happy with my purchase and think this is a great product.  I even recommended it to a friend who also bought one.The only disappointing thing is that the kindle does not support all applications.  I can not download adobe flash player and a magazine I subscribe to (Bark).  So if you have a particular application , make sure it is supported prior to the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Susan Mallory
Reviews.Content: Just love it!! My son wants one too. So I guess I will be buying another one soon. Also want the new Kindle HDX.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 2013 to replace a much loved Kindle Keyboard!
Reviews.Author: Shanfan
Reviews.Content: I've had it three days and so far am loving my new Kindle Fire HD 2013.  I bought it as a replacement for my old Kindle Keyboard.  I'd had the keyboard version for 3 or 4 years and was starting to have issues with charging and keys. Most of the time it needed to be reset to get it to charge. With several of the keys starting wear out I decided it was time to upgrade.  It's still going to be my back up.The new Fire is my first taste of touch screen, so the adjustment is 'interesting'!  I've been reading a book with it, played a couple of apps and have downloaded a weather app.  All seem to have gone smoothly and work pretty well.  I've just added a couple of favorite games (from keyboard and pc) so will see how that goes.  I found linking my email accounts easy, and downloaded a word doc from email without issue.The battery life is way shorter than with the keyboard, but I think that may be due to having kept a wifi connection while I've been experimenting.  I only really used it with the keyboard for downloads then switched it off.It may not be the most sophisticated kindle or tablet available, but the price is right (I opted for the extra charge for no special offers), the screen resolution is great, and so far it's been easy to use.Update - Nov 7:Not using the wifi so much has improved the length of time the battery charge lasts.  Screen clarity and responsiveness are great and the graphics on the apps I have downloaded are good.  I do find I sometimes try to push the side 'page turn' buttons which were on my Kindle keyboard, which don't exist on the Fire HD, but that's just me getting used to touch screen technology! :)  Page turning is inconsistent from e-books to downloaded docs.  Books you swipe sideways and the word doc I used needed to be swiped downwards.  I'll likely get used to that in time.Apart from those little quirks I'm still loving my new Kindle and recommend it for anyone wanting a little upgrade, but not needing all the bells and whistles of the more expensive models.

Reviews.Title: JUST LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Lidia
Reviews.Content: Really good tablet better than ipads!! Has good HD quality and can download alot of things! ! ! NICE price value and also has kindle kid mode which can is kid zone!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: S. Pollock
Reviews.Content: I bought this to mostly play games, read books and get my email when I am out of town without have to carry my heavy laptop. It does this and more. I haven't figured out how to use everything yet and the user manual is not the best so it's hit and miss as I try out everything. The price on this unit is excellent! I didn't want to pay $400 or $500 for an IPad or other tablet and this Kindle does everything I want. The only thing I might want on it is a camera but I wasn't willing to pay the extra $.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7", HD Display, WI FI,  16 GB
Reviews.Author: Katt Ottele
Reviews.Content: I love this!  The screen is crystal clear and books are so easy to download!  I love the fact I can shop for books from my Kindle.  I can visit Facebook, download music, and my photos.  The battery life lasts a long time.  I think the money I spent for it is well worth the money.  I don't know how I did without it, especially since I read a lot.  I can carry many books on it, as well as storing them on the Cloud. The Kindle e-books are very affordable so my reading addiction is always well fed.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: musksnipe
Reviews.Content: My first Kindle/tablet. It was easily setup and easy to learn how to access all it's features.I'm thinking of getting a second.

Reviews.Title: Xmas gift for my granddaughter, she always loves to use mine
Reviews.Author: sue
Reviews.Content: A 10 year old knows how to use it more than I did, she taught me things ! Love it

Reviews.Title: Amazing Tablet
Reviews.Author: awsome
Reviews.Content: I love this Tablet.Out of 5 stars I`ll give a 10 because i love this thing.Not only is it fast it provides a stunning 7" HD display which i think any other 7" tablet cant beat because i have or now had the nook and the samsung galaxy tablets.Good Job XD

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7" is awesome
Reviews.Author: A. Alexander "Watch lover"
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD is great.  I can listen to music on,read on it.check my email and download apps.  I did a lot of research on the Kindle Fire HD before I purchased it.  I really enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD Display
Reviews.Author: Charlene Dickmann
Reviews.Content: It's perfect I'm givinit to mto my granddaughter for Christmas so I/ll know more thenbut it's what she wanted sso that's a good start.

Reviews.Title: Parents beware!
Reviews.Author: M Bearden
Reviews.Content: This is our 3rd Kindle Fire in the family. Our first one, the original Fire, gave up the ghost and refused to charge. The second one, a Kindle FIre HD 1st generation is still alive and kicking which prompted us to buy another for our 4 year old who liked to play on mommy's. That was last Thursday...today is Tuesday..six (6!!) days!. I am downloading everything from the cloud AGAIN for the 3rd time now that the parental controls/password feature has deleted the entire library. I love using up bandwidth and GB of data to download the same games repeatedly because of a security feature that no one foresaw happening with the wonders of Kindle Free time and little fingers. They had great intentions by setting it so that repeated failed password attempts WIPE THE ENTIRE DEVICE...BUT this really stinks when you were hoping for a nice diversionary item for the hour and a half you spend on the road every single day gong to work and school only to get upset whining because "it's broke AGAIN mommy!" ... if you have children, take the time to check out some of the other kid friendlier devices because this will only cause strokes and heartache. Very very disappointed in a product I used to love.

Reviews.Title: Don't do it!!!!  Don't do it!!!
Reviews.Author: Patrick J. Fowler
Reviews.Content: Folks,  My mother in-law purchased the kindle Fire HD about 5 months ago.  I took a look and thought it was worth the money.  I ordered one for my wife for Christmas and found out the latest model does NOT have a camera unlike the early version of the Kindle Fire HD.  Spend a little extra money and get the iPad.  We also do not like getting advertized to death.  I'm not a fan of Apple but they do put out a good tablet.I'm not happy with their support.  The overseas support is not very good.  I would have to say that unfortunately Amazon is going by the way of bad service and going for the quick dollar as do most businesses as the grow.There are other brands available for the same price that have a camera.

Reviews.Title: LOVE/HATE
Reviews.Author: anonymous J
Reviews.Content: I'm going to make this short. I LOVE the new Kindle... I HATE that my child can now see ALL of the purchases I make on Amazon now and I can't turn that feature off. Until Amazon fixes that problem I refuse to buy any gifts from Amazon! Amazon misses out on about $2k on this Christmas alone. Next up Birthdays. FIX THIS PROBLEM!!!

Reviews.Title: Why you should consider the version with Special Offers
Reviews.Author: Mandy
Reviews.Content: There are hundreds of reviews that tell you why you may or may not like the Kindle Fire, but most do not mention anything about the Special Offers.At the time of this review, the 2013 Kindle Fire 7 8GB is priced at $154 without Special Offers or $139 with Special Offers. So buying the Kindle Fire w/ SO saves you $15. But that's not all. Your Kindle Fire will have SO displayed on the lock screen. You can also see these offers when you click on the 'Offers' button on the home page. Many of these offers are available only on select models such as the 2013 Kindle Fire HD 7. These may be limited time or limited quantity.Some of these Special Offers are excellent deals! For example, one recent SO was the $119 Kindle Paperwhite on sale for $19! Or the $100+ Keurig coffee brewer was on sale for $20. I just scored a $90 Barbie RV for $10. Do you see where I'm going with this? Buying the models with Special Offers gives you the potential for great deals and major savings. Maybe not all the SO are this great, but you have to admit, these deals were unbeatable (I'm still kicking myself for missing out on the $19 Kindle Paperwhite). Afraid you'll miss seeing these SO on your Kindle's screen? No problem. Amazon allows you to sign up for text notifications that will alert you when a SO is coming up.If you do buy the Special Offers and you later decide you no longer want to see the SO on your Kindle, you have the option of paying the extra $15 or $20 (can't remember which) to opt out of Special Offers.The Special Offers models are definitely worth considering if you plan to purchase a Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: As good as expensive tablets mostly
Reviews.Author: Leslie H.
Reviews.Content: I use my Kindle for email, web surfing, and I do a lot of my college work on it. It’s always with me. I don’t know what I’d do without it really. Most of my friends have iPads and I admit that the iPads are very nice. I used to want one, but after having my Kindle so long now I don’t see the need for a more expensive tablet. Don’t get me wrong, I still love ipads, and I probably would choose one of those if I had the extra cash. But if you’re someone like me that just uses a tablet for basic stuff I don’t see why a Kindle wouldn’t be perfect for you.

Reviews.Title: Great Device
Reviews.Author: Renei
Reviews.Content: This is an Excellent product. I would have given it 5 stars, however, I initially had problems downloading apps. I was guided through a troubleshooting process by a customer rep from amazon and was able to make downloaads after. Customr service from amazon kindle department was excellent. And the device is as well !!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7" is an exceptional device.
Reviews.Author: Christopher J. Cowen
Reviews.Content: This device is amazing and you will be happy you bought it. The Kindle Fire is an amazing device that displays images like as if they were lifelike.  The device features a fast 1.5GHz dual-core processor that run apps, games, and videos smoothly without any issues.  You will love this device and you can get free two day shipping with this offer.  So if you are in the market for a tablet you like this Kindle.  The marketplace from Amazon is great too.  There are thousands of books and games for free available to you.The thing that separates Amazon's Kindle devices is the fact that their customer service is world class. So many companies get this aspect of their businesses wrong but not Amazon. I had a Kindle device that died on me and they replaced it no questions asked. I have also had to call them occasionally and believe it or not I actually talked to a person, no recorded message. Amazon gets it when it come to their customer service.You will not regret getting this device.Thank you for reading my review, if you have any questions feel free to email me, I would be happy to help you with any questions you have.

Reviews.Title: Better than my ipad
Reviews.Author: ooooocha
Reviews.Content: Last Year, I bought a kindle fire hd and an ipad2. The ipad gets only 1/2 as much use as the kindle because I am constantly using my kindle to watch Netflix while tethered to the tv with a mini hdmi cable. I also choose the kindle to read on, and to watch videos while traveling as the sound is louder than the ipad. I only use the ipad to text and FaceTime when my cell phone is dead and to watch YouTube videos. About two days ago the ipad completely broke, I took it into the apple store but because its a year and a half old, they wouldn't replace or repair it. My kindle fire hd is still going strong and has never had a single issue. Now I know which brand I will be sticking with from now on! Extremely disappointed with the ipad since the cost was double the cost of the kindle! But I'm more than happy with my kindle, it was a great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great Machine, Great Price! Kindle Fire HD 7" Got disabled Vietnam Vet to dance around the room.
Reviews.Author: Beckherps
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased that the cost of this product finally was dropped into my price range.  I bought a Kindle PaperWhite when they when they first came out and am still happy with it!  When I opened the box and turned on the Fire HD 7" inch HD Display, Wi-Fi, & 8 GB RAM;  my wife told me that she "hadn't seen my smile so wide with my eyes so bright since before I left for the Vietnam War".  Since I am disabled with limited mobility, the Kindle 7 HD makes it possible for me to have a computer on the go.  People that have 2 working arms and legs don't realize how hard it is to take a notebook or laptop along and move around with crutches or a walker.  I was so happy to use my new Kindle I actually did drop the crutches and dance around the room!

Reviews.Title: Must have!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle and take it everywhere. I was able to find a case/stand for $20 that fit it perfectly too. I chose the "special offers" version to get money off, but that is easily fixed by downloading AdBlock. You can download music, apps, books, magazines etc. The reader lets you change the background of the page (white, black, beige), the text size, and line spacing. It has auto rotate so you can view in portrait or landscape. You can add ebookmarks, take notes, get books for much cheaper and faster, and it has a built in dictionary for looking up unfamiliar words by simply touching and holding the word. The speaker quality (for music) is great too.

Reviews.Title: This is my first Kindle Fire HD and I love it!
Reviews.Author: Alyson "AG"
Reviews.Content: The Kindle was very easy to set up. It automatically found my wireless network. No problem setting up my Gmail account. In fact, I haven't ran into any technical problems so far.I am new to using a Kindle so  this is probably user clumsiness but, navigating through the "shop for apps" wasn't much fun. The number of applications seemed very limited.  I jumped over to Amazon.com from my Net Book and found more than enough Android Apps to download. Now my Kindle is fully loaded.Note:  There is no Internal Microphone.

Reviews.Title: Wife loved it!
Reviews.Author: Ronnie Studstill Jr
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my wife,I love Amazon for there gift option before purchase.My wife cryed when she seen the little personalize card it came with.This was for Christmas this year but she could not wait once she found it.I have to say this is the best tablet she ha ever owned.It is fast,and really easy to use with plenty to do.It even came with free $5.00 for the app store,Amazon should really include that in its product description.I will be back for on of these for myself soon,and I recommend anyone else to get one too.

Reviews.Title: Not A Good Product
Reviews.Author: John Gray
Reviews.Content: I took it with me on vacation as a means to read.  Sitting outside in the sun, it was impossible the see the words.  I could not see my email, I could not see the internet things I searched for unless I was inside.  Not good.The upside is the great return policy.  I returned this within the 30 day window.  I have since purchased a Kindle Fire HDX 7" 32 GB and all of the problems with the Kindle Fire HD seem to have been resolved.

Reviews.Title: Do NOT buy as a 'gift' for a kid! Can't disable "Shop" (your Amazon account) and more-read the forums!!
Reviews.Author: Lassie_D "Lassie_D"
Reviews.Content: Amazon got too greedy by incorporating "Shop" into the menu/tying this to Amazon (or they'd be selling 10x more-WAY better than the $99 specials so many people are rushing out to buy/fulfill the kids' requests for tablets-which will probably get returned since they don't perform all that well to play games or don't have access to Google Play). Hello? You can download "Kindle Books" on any Android-based device, or shop Amazon if you want. The KindleFire by itself is an amazing tablet for the price, even with push ads, but no one in their right mind would create an Amazon account (even with a prepaid credit card to spend)and hand it over to a kid to waste said funds within 5 minutes buying apps like "Virtual High 5" or in-game "bonuses" for games they'll lose interest in within 20 minutes, then ask for MORE "credits" to buy the app they REALLY wanted....or maybe that's what Amazon was banking on by selling it so cheaply...hmmmm.I bought as a gift for my 12 year old, not knowing it's tied to my shopping account-even with parental controls on (the "Shop" menu option is permanent-cannot be disabled). Although he hasn't, he could open my shopping cart, see my orders, etc. Even if I set up his own account, it requires a credit card to "prove you live in the U.S."??? The only option I've found on forums is to "get a prepaid card with a small amount on it"??? Also, this was supposed to be HIS tablet. With the parental controls on, I have to log in the password every single time he wants to download ANY app.It is fast, runs great, great sound, great price, easy to use,very slick, just no way to disable the "shop" feature (built into the menu bar on the upper left), or easily separate it from my account. I'm returning it and spending a little more to get a quad core Nexus 7-pure Google, Google apps, access to Amazon Apps, Kindle Books, etc (he can use gift cards for Amazon now), with front and rear cameras and a microphone. Should've done it from the start because I felt like a real jerk giving him a gift he'd always wanted, then taking it away, although I'm sure he's going to love the Nexus 7 a million times better (plus won't need me to sign in or a credit card)-it'll be his.Update: My son LOVES the Nexus 7, and so do I. It's fast, wasn't that much more, better sound and performance for playing games (which is what kids want a tablet for) and no credit card required. PLUS he still has "Kindle Books" and "Amazon Apps", can use the Amazon gift cards (VERY popular) to either buy apps or something off of Amazon anyway.

Reviews.Title: newer is not better
Reviews.Author: ReedusD2
Reviews.Content: I must say I loved my kindle fire. When it stopped working correctly after almost 2 years I was excited when they replaced it with the HD ( I had the 2 year warranty) but after only 3 days the screen cracked just by holding it one handed. The first generation kindle fire was much tougher, I dropped that in a parking lot more than once and it never cracked. Needless to say the HD is not as kid friendly,as they drop it more than I do. So the crack that started where I hold it with my thumb has spread and I am debating to track down a first generation or switching brands altogether. I am extremely disappointed and will be crossing the KFHD off my kids Christmas list as well.

Reviews.Title: wouldn't buy until you do more research on it
Reviews.Author: gladys decarolis
Reviews.Content: Because I only have 5GBP and I thought I was getting 8gb ,and some of the space is already used up with the stuff you put on it,I wAnted to send it back and buy another one with more GBP but was told I couldn't't
