Reviews.Author: Paul F. page
Reviews.Content: Good product, but to small for my rather large hands.  Quick responce and excellent screen resolution.  Will order the larger screen size.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire Hd 7
Reviews.Author: Simon
Reviews.Content: It suits me very well. Regarding the price I am positivie surprise. Maybe a little bit to heavy device, but other things works very good. I will stay with Kindle also with next generations.

Reviews.Title: Never could get it to log onto internet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: In spite of a chat session and a 30 minute phone call (their tech folks couldn't figure it out either), I could never get it to log on to any of 5 different wifi.  While it would log onto the network, it was "local" only, no internet.  I returned it, but have not yet seen the promised $25 credit for my trouble.

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Christina Galbraith-Popma
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle and all I can do on it.  I love how I can read any way i want to and that its clear.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet choice
Reviews.Author: Daniel Bradley
Reviews.Content: Waited a long time to select a tablet and glad I waited for the Kindle HD. I got the 16GB version recently and am pleased with the quality of the device. Amazon provides all the content you need at reasonable prices.

Reviews.Title: amazing product
Reviews.Author: sheila
Reviews.Content: Crisp picture, great sound for a tablet, great touch screen. I bought this for my husband for Christmas and now I'm wishing I had of bought myself one too. The flash player is astounding in in game play. Works amazing for HD video too. It's easy to use. I highly recommend this product for all ages!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: I was worried when I first bought it that it would not do enough compared to that of an iPad.  But instead it has multiple useful apps and, most importantly, many free books.  At a price of 80 dollars, this was a great buy.  Light weight, great resolution, and many other uses.  If only it had a usb or sd card slot then this product would be perfect.  Other than that I would recommend this product to anybody.

Reviews.Title: Specifically Kindle Fire Free time
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought a KFire specifically for the kids, chosen for the "Freetime" built in to the device, but it does not allow adding selected (or any) music. I think this was a huge oversight on Kindle's part, my kids love music and I would like to have them able to play what I allow. Add music files to Freetime and it would get 5 stars from me.

Reviews.Title: Kept Crashing
Reviews.Author: Desi
Reviews.Content: Every time I would try to browse the internet the whole Kindle would crash, not pleased with it. Happy with my iPad.

Reviews.Title: Very smooth
Reviews.Author: Anthony Garofalo
Reviews.Content: enjoy the ease of use, apps open quickly and smooth video quality is excellent good sound for the device I really enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: Great electronic.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had the previous kindle fire...which my grandsons have now. This one is for my granddaughter...I think she will love it.

Reviews.Title: love it d except
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "LovestoRead"
Reviews.Content: Poor battery life I'm charging this daily and its always at the times I want to use it the most

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Jean Lee
Reviews.Content: I have my books and my audio books, what more can I ask for?All I need plus I can access email and the web when I want.So worth it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7" Display, WI-Fi, 8GB - Incluses Special Offers
Reviews.Author: Patrick E. Siebert
Reviews.Content: I am a big fan of Kindle and I decided to buy one for my daughter who loves it too.  This will be  a great Christmas for her...and her mother and I.  Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: didnt have the games or apps i wanted
Reviews.Author: Alan Codling
Reviews.Content: it was horrible because you cant even have watch Disney channel or a lot of apps that is the next gen. I suggest getting the 7 inch HDX kindle fire

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Wendy
Reviews.Content: This tablet is great, I use it daily even the kids enjoy using it. My only problem is that it lacks apps, there are not many to chose from. And I wish I could use a photo for wallpaper, but other than that its great.

Reviews.Title: I Found My Fire
Reviews.Author: Richard J. Gilbert
Reviews.Content: I intended to gift the Kindle Fire to my granddaughter, who is disabled but loves to stream tv shows and movies to her grandmothers Kindle.  I decided to purchase this for her OWN to use.  It was the best investment I ever made.  Of course I tried out the features before giving it to her for Xmas.  The picture is sharp, colors bright and text perfectly suited for her disability.  I highly recommend this device to any and all people who enjoy reading AND entertainment.  It went beyond my expectations and I'm sure my granddaughter will be delighted and enthusiastic when she receives it.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: mamulina kinabo
Reviews.Content: I bought the kindle as a christmas gift for my sister. I love the size and its very light. It was delivered on time and I did not pay extra.

Reviews.Title: I didn't open this one
Reviews.Author: M. Grannon "mellibean"
Reviews.Content: I had decided to order a Kindle for myself as I have wanted one for a long time. I order this one and not 10 minutes later did Amazon put the HDX up for less money than this one (it was 24 hour special). So I let this one come to my house (as the order couldn't be cancelled) and it was delivered on time. I returned it that evening to my UPS station. Amazon amazingly had it the next day and refunded my money the next day. I have to say kudos to both the UPS and Amazon. very quick turn around even though I didn't want the item after all. I hear tell that now Amazon is sell the 8.9 on a no-credit check no interest plan. Hmm wished I'd known.

Reviews.Title: <3 kindle
Reviews.Author: GoHawks!
Reviews.Content: Shhhh!  Its a surprise gift!Love the Kindles, so easy to use and awesome display!  Can'r wait to add Hubby's hunting pics!

Reviews.Title: Very good item
Reviews.Author: Josh Henriksen
Reviews.Content: Great gift, very easy to use, easy to work with shipped on time and arrived earlier than expected! I'm very happy with it!

Reviews.Title: Silk is terrible
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I have had this tablet for almost a year now and it was pretty good but silk (the web browse) has always been hard to use. Now silk has gotten so bad that I can't even use it.  Over half of the time it freezes the tablet, if you try to press the back button to go to the page you were just previously on it takes you back 4 or more pages. Even scrolling down is impossible now.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD7
Reviews.Author: Mary Nevius
Reviews.Content: I like this Kindle. It has good lighting and is clear and easy to use. I let my 4 year old great grandson sit with me and he can choose the apps he wants so easily. I would recommend it to others...... in fact, at my recommendation one of my friends got one and gave her old one to her granddaughter!

Reviews.Title: Great price, good device
Reviews.Author: A Rombach
Reviews.Content: I got one of these for my husband last father's day. My kids wouldn't let him play on it for more than a few moments without 'helping' so when the price dropped a little more we got one for each of them along with the kid's monthly subscription and if it were not for the time limits we can set we would never see our kids.My four year old and six year old are able to use most of the apps without much assistance. I was concerned about the amount of abuse I knew they were going to take but it had been a little while now and after some major droops and kicks they are still working strong. Hopefully this will stay this way as they get older and more used. I did buy cases for them to help absorb some of the bumps.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HD
Reviews.Author: Sherri Mizell
Reviews.Content: Was disappointed at all the advertising.  Did not see an option for no advertising.  But otherwise, I am loving it.

Reviews.Title: So good, I bought 3!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This is a Christmas gift for my mom. I own one of these already and it is AMAZING! I've worked this and the ipad and they are almost identical. The HD picture is awesome, sound is great. When buying this, it doesn't tell you that it ONLY comes with the car charger and USB. You must buy the power adapter (wall charger) separate. But the shipping is fast and worth every penny. I would highly recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire is wonderful!!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Love it! Take it with me everywhere. The crisp graphics make the experience outstanding, and the backlighting for reading is fantastic!

Reviews.Title: great gift
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: got this as a gift for my aunt.  she has a regular Kindle and had been wanting a table for a while.  the price of this was too hard to pass up.  Amazon was offinering $60 off back in October, so I purchased this for my aunt.  She loves it.  the more she uses it the more she discovers all that the tablet can do.  the tablet is fast and the color, pigmentation, and overall look of the screen is amazing.  for the price you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Shelley
Reviews.Content: Item received promptly, in perfect new condition. Easy to use and understand, perfect birthday gift for my daughter! Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle. It is convenient , easy to use, fits in my purse. The only thing I would like to see a choice of assessories pkged with the kindle or as a bundle.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: I got this for my mother for Christmas. She doesn't read, but she loves the tablet features.  She spends all day playing on it and it is a little safer than a computer for those who aren't very tech savvy.  I have both a nook Color and an original Kindle Fire and the Kindle is a million times better. I have even told people in Barnes and Noble to buy a Kindle instead!

Reviews.Title: My first Kindle
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: Showed up when expected.  Seems easiest enough to use.  Thank you.  It is a great product.I will share this with my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Whole family has kindles now...
Reviews.Author: Mallory Carpenter
Reviews.Content: I have the first gen kindle and love it. I recommend the Kindle HD every time anyone talks tablets. Best prices, best quality, tons of extras and my favorite is the direct amazon purchases (especially the books). Just ordered two more for the littles in the family, perfect for them with parental controls. Can't wait to see their faces light up when they open these!!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Tammy S Donath
Reviews.Content: Love the Kindle Fire! This one is for my son so he will stop running off with my 8.9" Kindle!!

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good
Reviews.Author: Miss Nomer "book lover"
Reviews.Content: I have an ipad, and with arthritis, it's a bit heavy holding it to read ebooks. I wanted something lighter and less expensive strictly for reading ebooks. I was disappointed in the Nook, and though I'm sure the Kindle Paperwhite is pretty good, I really like seeing books in color especially if they have photos or artwork within. The kindle fire HD was on sale and I purchased it. So far I like it very much. It's light to hold and has a good quality screen. Colors are vibrant. It was a little difficult getting my ebooks onto it, but buying the calibre companion app for $2.99 solved the problem. I have no complaints with it. I'm using it strictly for reading ebooks, though, so I can't comment on it's other attributes. I would have given it more stars if I could have loaded my ebooks onto it easier.

Reviews.Title: It was a gift to me, from me.
Reviews.Author: AM
Reviews.Content: Technically I'm supposed to wait until Christmas, so this was a quick trial to see what the features are. I will know more after Christmas. I love what I know so far.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: BARBARA KASTNER
Reviews.Content: I don't know what the special offer was on this but we love the Kindle! Much better than our I-Pad!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: JanitaLee
Reviews.Content: If your just looking for a device to do simple tasks then this is it! I am not much of a tech gunkie so this was my first real techie purchase. (I still have a dumb phone) ;) Love to be able to go online and read books and keep my son busy with books and games of all kinds.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!
Reviews.Author: WandaG.
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Kindle HD!! No problem whatsoever setting it up.  The display is clean and crisp and totally responsive. I'm not a gamer or a social media addict, except for Facebook, but it seems it would work equally well for them. I am a big reader and streaming video person and this works great on both counts. We travel quite a bit and I wanted something small to fit in my purse to pick up the occasional hotspot to catch up with family and friends back home. I can download lots of reading to take along with the 16GB. Can't say enough great things about my Kindle except why did I wait so long..for a great sale!!

Reviews.Title: I PURCHASED THIS FOR MY WIFE'S CHRISTMAS PRESENT, SO KEEP THIS QUIET FOR ANOTHER WEEK OR SO.
Reviews.Author: GARY
Reviews.Content: MY WIFE PURCHASED A KINDLE FIRE HD (THE BIG ONE) LAST YEAR FOR ME FOR CHRISTMAS.  I FIGURE SINCE I USE MINE EVERY DAY THAT SHE WOULD LIKE ONE TOO, HENCE THIS PURCHASE.I THINK SHE WILL LIKE IT, SHE HAS A KINDLE PAPERWHITE NOW.MERRY CHRISTMAS, LOVEY!!!

Reviews.Title: It's Ok
Reviews.Author: B Hop "average dude"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my wife's birthday,and she likes it.It was processed and shipped quickly by amazon.I think though the hd7 is a little bit overpriced.Because it does not come with a front or back camera.The bluetooth is proprietary.The OS is a little proprietary. No SD memory card slot. No User manual for the wife. Other than that its ok  for her to download books from the store.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: Device freezes every few minutes and shuts down at about 50% power.  When it freezes I have to restart it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Bacaczar
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. I like it a lot more than the Nook. When using Amazon be sure to sign up for Prime. Great service.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HD more than expected
Reviews.Author: Buffalo Subs
Reviews.Content: Wife loves it ... . Great tablet for little money, very useful and easy to use for the whole family

Reviews.Title: Would give 10 stars if I could!
Reviews.Author: tj james
Reviews.Content: My family now owns 5 kindles, because they are such an amazing gift for all ages. My kids aged 4 through 22 have gotten one for Christmas in past years and with the Free time put on for the younger children, everyone has a safe way to keep entertained. The price can not be beat if you really shop like me and find at Christmas adding , this or that small thing and end up spending more money than you realized. Putting down the money for a Kindle makes you stop buying little things and just end up with one awesome gift that the child is thrilled with. There are literally hundreds of free books, thousands of free aps, and if you are a smart consumer your child can have new things all the time with no more money spent. I love Amazon and I love Kindle

Reviews.Title: Little disappointed with the kindle free time for kids
Reviews.Author: M. Light
Reviews.Content: These are very nice.  My only complaint would be that I didn't understand that with the kid free time it's a separate app on there and the only way you can set time limits for kids is to pay a monthly fee.

Reviews.Title: I am a Kindle widow - the Kindle has taken over!!!!
Reviews.Author: MIZZOU
Reviews.Content: Gave to my wife as a gift - she loves it, Cons would be I am constantly unable to get her off the couch to do anything!!! She is reading it 24/7 and playing game, checking Facebook, and using it in the kitchen to see her recipes on the apps she has downloaded.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with amazon
Reviews.Author: Deborah
Reviews.Content: Got today. Hooked up via isp wifi with a Medialink wireless-N Broadband Router and amazon free 30day Prime service.HD Picture is outstanding. Alot of bang fof the buck. Very pleased with amazon. Get kindle and prime.read books,watch movies ,e-mail,plenty of apps. discounts on prime item purchases, 2day- free shipping.

Reviews.Title: Christmas present
Reviews.Author: Barbie Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I got this for my daughter for Christmas.  She plays on the one I had which is first generation.  Santa it's going tho make her very happy.

Reviews.Title: Good for PDFs
Reviews.Author: Ace
Reviews.Content: Great product. Being a science writer reading a lot of scientific papers, I bought this for reading PDFs. Works well for that purpose. The display is kind to the eyes. I haven't experienced eye strain yet.

Reviews.Title: Superior quality product
Reviews.Author: Kiwi Boy "Kiwi"
Reviews.Content: I have purchased earlier models of the Kindle but this one is superior in all ways, the clarity, sound and range of options is fantastic, top quality materials and packaging is far superior to any other company. I purchased two of the Kindles, one for a gift and I know the receiver will just love it as much as I do. Its amazing to see the upgrades from my earlier model and the extra software is amazing, its a complete tablet.

Reviews.Title: Live and learn
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: Wish I would have waited for the Christmas sale for the HDX.  Don't get me wrong, the quality is fine, but there are more features to the HDX that I would enjoy.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: maryann natale
Reviews.Content: bought  four  kindles so far for all my family  they are enjoying it too  we are amazon people for all our needs

Reviews.Title: It works for the price
Reviews.Author: D. T. Lamourine "Thomllama"
Reviews.Content: I got it at a deal at about 1/2 price solo...  It works well for reading books, basic web surfing and getting E-mails.... plays games better than the phones with the bigger screen  LOL

Reviews.Title: Love!!!
Reviews.Author: Jess84
Reviews.Content: This is my first step into tablet world and I'm not disappointed at all!  I bought this as a Christmas present for my 3.5 year old and after much research on kid tablets/game systems (i.e. LeapPad Ultra, Nabi etc.) decided on a Kindle Fire.  I'm not a techy person at all (I got my first smartphone 8 months ago...) and even I can figure out how to use this thing with ease.  The wi-fi is amazing, it picks up signals from my entire block and I've had no connectivity errors.  The parental controls for it are awesome.  I can turn off in-app purchasing, limit time spent playing, and I'm sure many other features that I've yet to discover.  Time will tell if it holds up in the hands of my son, but I bought a pretty padded case for it, so we'll see.  I'll update this if anything should happen (knock on wood).

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Maggie the Cat
Reviews.Content: Wow--how I lived without this device for so long is beyond me!  You can instantly stream hundreds of movies and TV shows at no additional cost with Amazon Prime.  The picture is crisp, clear HD.  It is totally user friendly, easy to use--basically, just turn it on, and the prompts let you know what to do.  It came with free protection, uses wifi from your computer, you can stream from the cloud--I am amazed at how much this little device will do.  You can read and send emails, etc, etc, etc.  Such a wonderful Kindle.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jacquelyn A. Jobe
Reviews.Content: Iabsolutely LOVE my Kindle Fire HD!  Best money I've spent in a very long time! As much as I loved my Kindle paper-white, this is sooo much more!

Reviews.Title: What a great little tablet.
Reviews.Author:
Josie "Hi there All,
I am a 63 going on 64 ye...
Reviews.Content: I had thought I may have made a mistake getting a Kndle fire HD as it was so cheap, it could not be very good, WRONG.  It is a great little tablet and so far I have had no trouble what so ever using it, it is fast,reasonably simple and so far has lived up to every thing it was touted for.  If I have one complaint, it is that it does not come with a user guid in a book, you have to fumble about for a few days to sort it all out, or (like me) you can get a user guid for 98 cents, which after all is not a great sum to pay.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire second generation
Reviews.Author: Cavalierlover
Reviews.Content: This little tablet is so handy and portable, much more so than a laptop.  Just slip it in your tote and you can read, play a game, make notes; do whatever suits you all in one neat little package.  Will it replace your laptop or desktop...no, but for what it is and the price it is a deal.  I debated for a long while about purchasing this and on the down side if you are looking for a video camera this is not for you.  Otherwise, if your expectations are realistic it is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Grandma loves it
Reviews.Author: Richard K. Kohl
Reviews.Content: These are great gifts.  I gave this to my mother so she can keep in touch with the grand kids and the great grand kids.  She loves it and it has a wonderful screen for pictures and movies.

Reviews.Title: Fits all my needs
Reviews.Author: Robert Gray
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet for my uses as a reader and tablet. It is well worth the extra $20 that the paperwhite would have saved. I use it AND my kindle keyboard alternately and equally but with the fire I can also access the internet on my router.

Reviews.Title: Would not connect to the Internet
Reviews.Author: Annette Mcqueen "Annette"
Reviews.Content: Could not get it to connect to the internet or to my emails.  Spent two hours on the phone with Verizon and they couldn't get it to connect either.  I sent it back but they still charged me return postage.

Reviews.Title: Extremely good value for the money.
Reviews.Author: Andrew Kelly
Reviews.Content: It is light and clear to read in varying light conditions. Switching between apps was fairly smooth and only a few game apps seemed to want to hog resources from the background. Set up was easy and adding WiFi on the fly was done with little trouble. Only real suggestion I would make is a WiFi shutoff switch configured closer to the main screen for times when you find yourself in an area with less than perfect WiFi coverage. I am in a rural area and when i used it away from WiFi coverage without turning off the transmitter the battery took a major hit.(Went from 98% to 23%  in less than 4 hours with no use by myself.) Once i remembered to turn it off battery life came back into expected performance.

Reviews.Title: short lived product
Reviews.Author: Nicole M Jordan
Reviews.Content: My kids love it....unfortunately we bought 2 in july and both randomly stopped working in November and December. They shut down, would not charge or turn back on. Hardly worth it if the product only lasts 6 months!

Reviews.Title: Does what it says and does it very well.
Reviews.Author: Rick "Music Lover"
Reviews.Content: Faster than my iPad and far lower cost for nearly the same thing.  It satisfies all that I needed and wanted.  It's small so print can be small, but that's the price one pays.  One issue...I never know where the 'on' button is.  I don't want to have to look.  With the iPad it's right there.  I finally put a small piece of tape to show me where the little thing is.  The other question is I'm not sure if a) can an app be turned off and b) is this an app off or using power?  I could find nothing in the book about exiting an app.  Some clearly have an exit while others are an unknown.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HD
Reviews.Author: A. Kelly Kuykendall
Reviews.Content: easy to use, works well , the one that  cost more is now on sale. But I do like the one I got

Reviews.Title: The Best Early Gift
Reviews.Author: Richard Jones
Reviews.Content: I just got my kindle and have been using it for one week. Every thing has been going very well. I love reading on it, and have enjoyed the games. Downloading has been easy. The best early Christmas gift.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable !!!!!! Superior product
Reviews.Author: Don Fairweather
Reviews.Content: Simply amazing. Can't believe that I waited this long to purchase a Fire. The product exceeds my expectations. The time on my laptop has declined dramatically, I find that the Fire has helped me to be more productive not to mention the entertainment value that it serves.

Reviews.Title: Great Except for Battery Life
Reviews.Author: donda
Reviews.Content: I love it only wish the battery lasted longer. The battery supposedly has a 10 hour life, but it is more like 4 and that is disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Erin
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love my new kindle fire hdx! It is wonderful overall. As a prime member, I love the streaming videos and have watched videos the last three nights while working out. The battery seems very good and you can't ask for a better screen (7 inches is kind of on the small side, might go for larger screen next time but it does fit in my purse nicely). The processor is very fast too and I did the rest of my Christmas shopping on it (Amazon of course). The only problem with it is that my husband keeps stealing it so I plan on getting him one soon. I just wish that I would have bought it on cyber Monday to save $50 like I did on mine. Don't hesitate to buy one. You won't be able to put it down.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as previous generation,
Reviews.Author: lflanegan
Reviews.Content: Not as good as the Previous Gen. in my opinion. There is no camera, it has 8 GB and the prev gen has 16 GBturns off randomly - then when you turn it back on, it takes you to the beginning of the book instead of where you left off.

Reviews.Title: Having fun but . . .
Reviews.Author: LOUISE A MONACO
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying some elements, but having trouble figuring out others.  I wish it contained more info on how to use certain features.

Reviews.Title: Not easy to set up
Reviews.Author: C. T. Fetscher "CotuitTim"
Reviews.Content: It is very difficult to enter information and it is also hard to modify the security settings. I bought this for my wife and she will not be able to use it.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Charles Neely "Soldier"
Reviews.Content: excellent tablet, arrived as promised.  a great starter for a kid or young person but, also great for the advanced user.

Reviews.Title: very user friendly
Reviews.Author: teresa lyles
Reviews.Content: love it, very user friendly. It was very easy to set up initially.  it was shipped on a timely matter.

Reviews.Title: Device is fine.  Better instructions needed.
Reviews.Author: Nina Stawski
Reviews.Content: The device itself is fine.  The instructions on how to use it were abysmal.  It needs to come with an instruction booklet or tip sheet for those who get the gift but do not have immediate internet access.  If you can't initially see a tutorial or find help, figure out how to register it, or find out where the hidden menu is, your gift is worthless until you can get internet access.  There should at least be some kind of tip sheet included that at the very least tells you that you have to swipe from the top to view the hidden menu.

Reviews.Title: AS ADVERTISED!
Reviews.Author: TheMask
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD is everything ask for. The Ads are not a problem as you see them once.  I am able to read , Facebook, surf the net with ease.

Reviews.Title: great for kids!!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Totally meet my expectations. Perfect for kids. Got my 4 year old one for his birthday. We love the apps, the movies, books. This is the best entertainment gadget and fairly priced.No camera, the Kindle fire hd we bought last year had this.Very sturdy, of course its best to have a case on it. We bought the I blason kid cases and are l pleased.

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it
Reviews.Author: edward a. zydek
Reviews.Content: bought this for my wife who didn't think she wanted a tablet. She is now on it CONSTANTLY ! color and sound are excellent, takes a little while to learn how to put on music and books, though. She LOVES it !

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: Easy to learn. A lot of really good free books. Lighted screen makes reading very easy on the eyes. Very good price. The cord could be longer for charging when you want to read and the battery is low.

Reviews.Title: Great eReader/Tablet!!
Reviews.Author: DK_Mom
Reviews.Content: I like the device. I have the first generation Kindle Fire and decided to buy the new one for my son. I like that it is an ereader tablet so that I can put books on it for him and also a tablet so that he can play games and watch movies when we travel (which we do a lot). The KindleFreeTime is great for limiting the amount of time that he plays games and watches movies. The only reason that it doesn' t get five stars is because it does not have a camera. Other than that I absolutely love the Kindle Fire HD.

Reviews.Title: Good one for email and some games
Reviews.Author: K. Dvorak "muscle therapist"
Reviews.Content: Great size. hard to read outside in sunlight. Hard to see video movies because it's so dark even after I've lightened it by control as much as possible. I love that it connects to Amazon. Apps work easily, easy to download. I don't like that some things can't be removed: I've got a Spanish book on that I can't remove.

Reviews.Title: Don't order on a deadline.
Reviews.Author: Kate
Reviews.Content: I can't speak to the item yet so I'm giving it 4 out of 5 stars in good faith that it will be of the same quality as my e-reader was.  I am, however, writing to say order plenty of time in advance.  This item was sent good old Fedex smart post.  They didn't drop it off to fedex until the 3rd and it was promised delivery of the 4th (I ordered it the 2nd).  Fedex didn't get it to my local post office until after the cut off date, and now I will not be able to get it until tomorrow (the day I will be unavailable, and needed it for).  I will say that Amazon, as always, had awesome customer service and did all the could to try to arrange to get it to me, get another shipped out to be delivered today, to see if I could go pick it up at the post office it's currently being held at, etc.  I will never bash Amazon customer service as they always try their hardest to remedy the situation, and in my case extended my prime by a month as an "apology gift," if you will for the inconvenience.  But, if you're going to be ordering this and need it for a specific date, order plenty of time in advance because once Fedex and the Post office start their tango...neither of them will take responsibility or help in correcting their problems.January 11, 2014 updateSo, I've had this item for about a month and a half.  The battery life crapped out over the past few days, before my kindle finally decided it wasn't going to turn on or accept a charge.  I've tried plugging it in to different outlets, as well as tried to charge via my computer with the supplied USB charger rather than plugging the USB charger into the wall plug that came with my kindle.  When it still didn't work I contact customer service and was blessed with someone who seemed to not have a grasp on the English language.  I explained to him my issues, and my trouble shooting of plugging it into different sources and it still not even showing me that it's charging, much less turning on.  The solution they had was to credit my account 20 bucks so I could order a new wall jack (when we've established the wall jack ins't the issue, it's either the cord or the kindle itself).  I repeated back to them that they wanted me to buy another wall jack when I'd confirmed the wall jack wasn't the issue, and I was told "yes."  I ended the conversation because at 10 at night I am not going to play that game, and will try again tomorrow to get someone who can manage to understand the troubleshooting I've already done to try and rule out where problems may lie and will update once I hopefully have a reasonable solution to this.  But, it's not a good sign when a product doesn't hold a charge and doesn't power on just after 60 days, and the customer support team in place to handle it can't follow basic trouble shooting to remedy the situation quickly.  ...here's for hoping.January 14th, 2014...I'm returning both Kindle's.  I spoke with someone the 12th who said they'd send me a replacement.  They sent me a refurbished one.  Customer service tried to tell me the order was for a brand new one, I explained the sticker on the box flat out says "refurbished," in a bunch of languages other than English.  At this point I'm returning both of the Kindle's.  The product was fun while I had it, and I enjoyed it.  I will say that much.  But, in the several times I have had to speak with kindle support since I've had it, it has been a larger headache than the product is worth.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD  A must have.
Reviews.Author: Tony D. Fawcett Sr.
Reviews.Content: I haven't put it down yet. I play fast scrolling games with no problems. I take it everywhere with me. Its lite and mobile. My grandaughter loves watching movies on it. You can't bet it for the price.

Reviews.Title: Very nice tablet.  Glad I made the purchase
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: Great tablet so far.  Nice collection of Aps.  Would be nice if they had some of the ones that the Ipad has.  Also, you need Adobe Flash player to watch some videos on You tube and such which this doesn't have so that kind of sucks.

Reviews.Title: Won!derful Birthday Present
Reviews.Author: Michelle Bliss "Grandma Bliss"
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift for my ten year old granddaughter. She is always wanting to use mine when she comes over. My daughter said she has not put it down since she go it. They have established an Amazon account, she can download some free books with Mom and she plays her games on it all the time. It is the first thing she turns on in the morning and the last thing she turns off at night. It does so much more than her I-touch. I am so glad I got this for her! She loves to read and now her books are at her fingertips, literally! I am getting her an Amazon gift card for Christmas so she can download what she wants. Great purchase!!

Reviews.Title: Read the description thoroughly :)
Reviews.Author: cj
Reviews.Content: This tablet was a little confusing at first but it didn't take long to figure it out. The ads and pictures make it look like there are a bunch of apps already loaded, but that is not the case. I was actually glad that I didn't have to go through and delete a bunch of apps I'll never use, the only ones on it are the ones I put on it.  I expected that there would be a camera on it when the advertisements mentioned photo managing. I was a little disappointed when I found no camera.  It was my fault though for not reading the description carefully.  All in all, I love it. It is a good tablet for the money.

Reviews.Title: Kind Fire HD 7" Newbie review:
Reviews.Author: Nathaniel Steinwachs
Reviews.Content: Self-explanatory, even for someone without tablet experience, of any kind, like me.  I also like the size...it seems the perfect size, small enough for travel convenience, yet large enough to read clearly.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME - LEARNING TOOL for the whole family
Reviews.Author: Jackie Harris
Reviews.Content: Awesome!! Well worth the money spent.  I can use it as well as my children.  Makes learning fun for my children.

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: Gary Lessard
Reviews.Content: Love the kindle fire, it is the best thing i have purchased, keep me updated on things on the web, mail, and looking things up. It is light weight and easy to carry.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the quality, price and beauty of the KINDLE FIRE HD!! Buy 2 and still have $$ left if considering 1-ipad mini!!
Reviews.Author: NoMoneyG
Reviews.Content: You can't beat the quality and beauty of the KINDLE FIRE HD!! This is my second one as I am buying this one for my Daughter for Christmas. Save yourself $200 from the ipad mini and get a equal to better product with this. You can buy 2 of these for the price of the ipad mini!!! Highly Recommended!!

Reviews.Title: Very happy!

Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and I have really enjoyed it!  I can watch my TV shows on it, listen to music, create a spreadsheet, play Sudoku, and check Facebook - oh and of course read a book!  It took a VERY long time to ship, which is unusual for Amazon, but that didn't affect how I feel about the actual device.  It is so much more than an eReader.  Love!

Reviews.Title: Comparing
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: It is a better choice than the Sony bookman I had. It is easier to read and easier to use. What more can I say.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: hracing13
Reviews.Content: She loves it! It is user friendly as well as very clear? Was also delivered very quickly thank you, joe

Reviews.Title: Love the Kindles
Reviews.Author: gameplayer
Reviews.Content: I have now owned three Kindles and have loved them all. I now have the Kindle Fire HD 8.9. I can do almost everything from my Kindle and find I do not really need my laptop. It processes faster than my laptop and is so portable. The only suggestion I would make is in regards to the charging. If most people are like me, they use the Kindle lengthwise which makes it hard to use while plugged in. I feel it would be better if the plugs were on the shorter sides.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Jamie G.
Reviews.Content: I love My Kindle HD!! Don't know what I would do without it. I would recommend a kindle to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire Rocks
Reviews.Author: Chrissy
Reviews.Content: because Kindle Fire ROCKS! After having an initial issue because it was delivered to me with the language it set to Spanish I have not had any issues so far. And the Amazon Kindle Help forum is awesome because that is how I was shown how to change the language so I could set up my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding product and support from Amazon!
Reviews.Author: Charles Buggs
Reviews.Content: My grandkids are learning from the outstanding FREE apps available from Amazon.  We could not be more pleased from the customer service and shipping dates.  Thank you very much for your service.

Reviews.Title: My Introduction to the world of Kindle
Reviews.Author: Desertweave
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is everything I hoped for and more.  Love it!  Did not take me long to get up and running.

Reviews.Title: Fist Tablet Ever
Reviews.Author: dawn
Reviews.Content: i love my kindle it is fun for the whole family. Didnt know how much it stops fights in car rides lol. Well it is a fight over who had it longer got to get a second one

Reviews.Title: Great Gift Idea
Reviews.Author: Janice M. Jordan
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter and she loves it!  She has already read several books and likes the fact that she can order them with her Amazon card.

Reviews.Title: A perfect gift for someone without cable TV!
Reviews.Author: Rosemarie Pinette
Reviews.Content: This is the main gift for Christmas and I'm excited that the user will have access to the web on a larger screen in HD than a hand held cell phone. In comparison to many of the tablets available, the Kindle Fire HD 7" has so much to offer for a great price.

Reviews.Title: so worth every penny
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Im absolutely addicted to my kindle it does everything I need it too.. the only downside is the battery dies pretty quickly..

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet for a Great Price
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: I owned the Kindle Fire for less than a year before it broke on me and when I full-filled my warranty I was given a gift card and I purchased the Kindle Fire HD.  I hadn't don much research about the changes that were made between the two different versions because I hadn't been originally planning on getting a different product, but the Kindle Fire HD cost the same what the Kindle Fire had previously cost so it only made sense to purchase this version.Bringing it home was exciting.  We opened it out and got it all setup.  The setup was easy to do and very quick. We were worried about linking the account since we hadn't been able to unlink it from the first Kindle, but they made that easy, too!  That was definitely plus!  The screen on this model is so much nicer and clearer.  It makes it so much easier to see everything on the screen.  The touch screen is more responsive and works better for games.Internet browsing isn't much different.  It is a little annoying though I do still browse the internet.  The browser is just a little flawed.  Overall the Kindle Fire HD is great for reading books, playing games, and ok for browsing websites.  This is a great tablet for an amazing price.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Khris Johnson
Reviews.Content: So far I have bought 4 Kindle Fire HD's. My husband bought mine for my birthday, and I love it. So I bought one for my mom for Christmas last year, bought my husband one, and recently bought my son one.  We all love it. It's affordable, it does everything we want it to do.  Works great.  We have no complaints.  I would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet/Reader for the price

Reviews.Content: It's everything I wanted in a Tablet.  Great Battery Life; easy to convert all my previous purchases from Kindle Store into this new one.  Very Lightweight.  Definitely worth the price.  Although Apple has a slick model; the price is too much.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7" workds well.
Reviews.Author: Paul L. Shick
Reviews.Content: It works quite well.  The displays and apps are clear and easy to navigate. I am enjoying it.  My only complaint that occasionally it will freeze.  But if I turn it off and back on it usually is fine.  This has only happened twice since I received it.

Reviews.Title: Great Kindle for the price
Reviews.Author: Durenda
Reviews.Content: I bought my grandkids boths a Kindle Fire HD last year for Christmas and they love it. Actually we all love it. So this year I bought myself one and my son bought one for himself. Very nice product!

Reviews.Title: A great tablet for a great price!
Reviews.Author: jjsmom
Reviews.Content: The tablet is very user friendly.  I originally considered an iPad because they seem so user-friendly; however, the iPad's price was just too much for me to justify.  I found the Kindle Fire to exceed all my expectations, and for a such a better price, too!  The picture quality is amazing, the controls (to dim/brighten the screen, adjust volume, etc.) are very easy to access - I love it!  I have recommended it to my friends and will continue to do so in the future!

Reviews.Title: LOVE KINDLE

Reviews.Content: This is my first Kindle Fire HD and I love it.It's fun and it's exciting and relaxing to play!! ABSOLUTLY LOVE IT!!!!!!!!!One down fall though is it gets hot to the touch

Reviews.Title: Gift for mother in law

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD, Awesome !!!!

Reviews.Content: Love my new Kindle Fire HD!!!  So user friendly and access to the web and places like Facebook and Pinterest are awesome !!downloading is fast and easy for  both books and apps....  love the  finger touch  or swipe  and the brightness control..

Reviews.Title: I can't think of anything that I don't like about it! :) Color is AMAZING!!

I can't think of one thing that isn't great about them. The color is beautiful! The wifi is fast. They have lots of apps and you can download a book or movie in seconds. It would literally be the ONLY tablet for me if they had the ability to network and have windows, but I guess we can't have it all and I've been used to having one computer for work and one for pleasure for years so this isn't really anything new.

Reviews.Title: Price Was Right

Reviews.Title: I Love My Fire
Reviews.Author: Natalie
Reviews.Content: I absolutely LOVE my Kindle Fire HD!  I got it as an early Birthday gift this year, and I love everything about it so far!  I have 4 kids, 10 and under, and they are constantly asking about their "Kindle turn", so I think Santa is going to bring them one of their own for Christmas!  I haven't had any issues with it yet, and have been using it daily (maybe too much?!?!) for about 3 weeks.  Love the apps, love the Cloud, and just found out I can even upload my existing non-Amazon music to the Cloud to play on the Kindle!!!  Zero regrets, best electronics purchase I have ever made!

Reviews.Title: So much you can do with it.
Reviews.Author: Catherine Hernandez
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Kindle. I use it everyday and take it everywhere with me. I use it to study, organize my life, read, play games and even exercise. Basically there's an app for anything in my life I'm interested in. Because it's so portable I can get things done when I am waiting in line or in a waiting room. I can learn Spanish while getting my oil changed. The only flaw I've found is that every time you plug it in it turns on and the port to plug it in is at a weird angle and I've heard people say that part goes bad sometimes. My husband got one too and his had "rebooting" issues after only a week and he had to send it back. But they sent him a new one immediately and he hasn't had a problem since. I prefer to use a stylus on mine because I do A LOT of typing. I would give four and a half stars if I could because it's nearly perfect and you can do so much more than just read books! Love it!

Reviews.Title: Awesome buy

Reviews.Content: I'm happy happy with my very first Kindle it was delivered on time very easy set up I had no problems what so ever I've downloaded my favorite books and games I can tell you for the price I paid you will not regret buying it. I love love my new Kindle!!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: worth myers
Reviews.Content: has a lot of functions but i am having trouble removing items i dont want  and there doesnt seem to be any help in that department.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: Barbara Barnum
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle and have taken advantage of the 2 year extra warranty and also signed up for Prime. I really feel I received a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Jackie Savage
Reviews.Content: My grandson had his 6th birthday and we gave him the kindle fire we purchased from amazon. He loves it and he had no trouble using it.

Reviews.Title: I love my fire
Reviews.Author: MollieQ
Reviews.Content: I have always been an avid reader, but did not have the time to read very many books.  My Kindle Fire allows me to read my books ( yes, I read multiple books at the same time) without weighing down my purse, read during dead time (waiting rooms, grocery store lines, etc.) and aids in my everyday duties (chore app reminds me what chores I need to do and the supplies I need to do them).  I keep my grocery lists on the Kindle and store sales ads.  Silk and the web are a little wonky but I didn't purchase my Kindle as a functioning tablet, it is a plus to me that the web is available.  I have my music loaded and it comes in handy when I can play a fussy baby's favorite song in a long checkout line.  The display is great for movies and television shows.  The only problem I have with my Kindle is that I am becoming a bit obsessed.

Reviews.Title: Well worth it!
Reviews.Author: Linda Tague
Reviews.Content: Love my new Kindle Fire...have an older one but I love the size and the graphics on this Fire HD!

Reviews.Title: LOVE it!!
Reviews.Author: Carolina Pelayo
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet! it's insanely fast, and although the kindle apps are more limited than the apple apps, you can barely tell the difference. you also get 5 free dollars worth of amazon coins to buy any apps you'd like.  i really love this kindle, and highly highly recommend it. It's worth more than the price!

Reviews.Title: Kindle great, service not so much
Reviews.Author: chris harris
Reviews.Content: To start i like my kindle fire HD, when it works and here is the problem. It freezes up a lot, and when I am reading the book and using the text-to-speech feature it will turn about 10 pages at a time and then it is hard to find my place again. I called customer Service and two times they sent me ANOTHER ONE, not a NEW ONE, but a USED ONE and it still does not work right. They just keep sending me someone else old broken kindle.Update: 12-5-13:Customer service contacted me and they were very kind and helpful. They could not resolve my issue with my kindle on the phone but they did give me a 80% refund on my kindle and I sent it back to them. She also gave me a $20.00 credit toward my new Kindle Fire HDX 7" which by the way is great. They gave me a 80% refund plus $20.00 which was very fair, for a kindle that was 4 months old. I am very satisfied with the out come.

Reviews.Title: Good value case
Reviews.Author: Lisa Barrett
Reviews.Content: I bought this case for my husband's birthday, as was the Kindle Fire.  He really likes it.  We like the fact that it puts the Kindle to sleep when the cover closes.  We like the ability to stand the Kindle landscape.  It was well worth the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Really nice product
Reviews.Author: Cora7777
Reviews.Content: I'm enjoying my new Kindle Fire. I took advantage of the FAA deal on November 4th, so I bought it at a lower discounted price brand new. The reason I chose the Kindle instead of another product was for reading purposes.  I also wanted an affordable tablet that I could search the web with without having to start up my laptop. I still enjoy having a laptop, by the way, and I'm not looking to replace it.  I gave this purchase a lot of thought. I had been leaning towards an ipad or a Samsung Galaxy.  But after looking around my house I felt that an ipad would be a purchase I didn't need. And although I loved the way the Galaxy looked, I felt that the product was apples to apples to the Kindle, with the galaxy costing a tad bit more than what I wanted to spend. I'm sure others would not agree. But honestly, they are both android applications so really how different could they be use wise? I already have an iphone and a laptop (and had recently gotten rid of a mini computer).  Nothing is wrong with any of these products, just to be clear.  I felt like they all were nice. I had to rationalize to myself and what I really wanted was a smaller device I could put in my purse or use around the house that was fast, affordable and easy. It was a challenge not to make it about the product itself, instead of what I would be using this product for, but I managed. We are always thinking of these items as investments. But really they are disposal items, in the long run, with the way technology is constantly evolving. Think about that first digital camera we all purchased years ago that we would never use now because the clarity is just not there. I know everyone raves about the ipad, and everyone seems to have one but I just couldn't justify the purchase. Many people I know have a Kindle and most of the people who have them love them. The amazon reviews are mixed. So it was a mixed bag of opinions. Since I'm a pretty easy person to please, I knew I'd enjoy this product. I also felt that there were probably many users that probably love this product, but haven't vocalized it and never will.  It depends on what you are using it for. My primary purpose is for reading, which is what the Kindles and Nooks specialize in so that's were I looked first. The reality is that if an electronic device breaks, I'm just going to turn around and buy another one so I don't want anything too expensive because products become outdated quickly and we are always looking for the next best thing. As soon as it's damaged, starts to run too slow or is outdated, I'm going to trade it in for a new model. That's just the reality. That would hurt if I bought a more expensive tablet that pretty much does the same thing...that made this purchase easy. Arrival time was sooner than anticipated, I received it five days later. I took it right out of the package and started using it that day.  I didn't even need to read the instructions to start it up, that's how easy its been.  Anyone who has used a smart phone or any kind of tablet at all will be able to pick one of these up and use it without instruction. So far it's been a great tablet.  I don't even mind the special offers page, I kind of like knowing what's out there. I put a password on my Kindle so that no one could accidently purchase anything. All and all I feel like I'll get some good use out of the product. The battery life has been great so far, it will last me all day and I use the Kindle for hours at a time. This model comes with a charger. Nothing but good things to say right now. I like the look and feel of it so far. I'm a happy customer.

Reviews.Title: VERY SATISIFIED
Reviews.Author: W BOWMAN
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a xmas gift for my granddaughter.I loaded up apps on it and books when I received.Love the ease of use and great for internet surfing.Get deal.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: S. Beardsley
Reviews.Content: Bought as a present for my technology impaired husband. He wants to get into the 21st century apparently! It's easy to use, even for him. He's had no issues getting up and running. I've had the fire that came out last year and just love these tablests that Amazon keeps putting out.

Reviews.Title: Great product !!!
Reviews.Author: Anthony Kramek
Reviews.Content: Don't regret this purchase at all. Great to play Minecraft on and my niece is in love with how easy it is to operate she's 7. One thing I noticed is its alot faster loading pages than I expected :)

Reviews.Title: Flash Player
Reviews.Author: Clifton New
Reviews.Content: This is one of only a few tablets that you can actually use flash player on. Definatley worth it to me.

Reviews.Title: Works great, easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Nelson Herbert
Reviews.Content: Does exactly what I wanted it to do. I use it at the gym to watch movies while I'm doing cardio. Picture quality is good, sound quality is great. The only thing that I didn't like was putting the stupid screen protector on. Air bubbles are a pain in the rear. Other than that, I like it.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "NY fan"
Reviews.Content: I love my new kindle fire.  I use it daily. Take it everywhere I go. The size is perfect, color is phenominal, it does everything I need it to do

Reviews.Title: Kindle or Computer Kindle by far
Reviews.Author: Delma R Windsor
Reviews.Content: My husband and I can do a lot of different games and learn differnt things using the Kindle and not be connected to the computer.

Reviews.Title: Two Year Old prefers Kindle.
Reviews.Author: Richard J. Schuyler
Reviews.Content: Having purchased the original Kindle fire for myself, my grandson, and a student, I was naturally super excited about the new Kindle Fire HD so I had one sent to my daughter. She loved it of course! So did her 2 year old who promptly took it over preferring the kindle to  the family I-pad. In an attempt to return the Kindle to its intended owner I sent my granddaughter a somewhat similar looking low-budget tablet. My grandaughter picked up the new unit, touched the screen, looked at some apps and promptly declared "This is not a Kindle!" I guess I'll soon be buying my fifth Kindle soon.

Reviews.Title: Happy Happy Joy Joy
Reviews.Author: BigSkyMike "Mike"
Reviews.Content: Perfectly happy with this purchase.  It does everything I expected it to do and more.  Now if I could just get it away from the other family members.

Reviews.Title: don't let the price fool you, it is a more than capable device.
Reviews.Author: DaEXfactoR
Reviews.Content: Bought these for the kids for Christmas. They are too young to warrant the price of an iPad. The Kindle Fire HD does the same job for a fraction the cost. And don't let the price fool you, it is a more than capable device.

Reviews.Title: Great product and great price
Reviews.Author: Mrs Tia
Reviews.Content: This is a great gift! For my 10 year old daughter even better I got it for $70 on sale not $139 I already put her kiddie game on it and amazon gave her $5 dollor credit so she can buy her a game on it, she wanted a iPad but I like this better.

Reviews.Title: Almost unhappy customer-put a GOOD wall charger in with the purchase!!
Reviews.Author: addictive
Reviews.Content: My rough start almost had me packing this up and shipping it back. When you buy a laptop, it comes with a wall charger. So why would the Kindle not come with one? No where in the ads does it say accessories are a separate purchase. I bought a cheap accessory pkg. With a wall charger - bad idea. It took forever and I  never got a full charge.  I complained to Amazon about this and was sent a complimentary power charger that really works!  I've had my Kindle now for 5 months and love  it!  I have read so many books! I keep it with me everywhere. If I just had internet access  everywhere, to stream movies,email,etc. I would be totally lost to Cyber- land.

Reviews.Title: Better than an iPad!!!
Reviews.Author: Eli Leon
Reviews.Content: The Kindle has amazing graphics, even better than an iPad or iPod (which my brothers have, so I often compare), it has lots of apps and books and it's really cool that they have a free app of the day. I love that 1.) the app store gives you opportunities to get free Amazon coins (on the first day I had my Kindle, I had $6.20 of free coins due to the free $5 it gives you for having the Kindle and the Halloween sale they had) and 2.) you can use a Visa gift card to put money on it instead of a credit card. The best part about is  that it processes things really fast so there's no lagging and loading things doesn't take forever like it does on other things. The only negative thing I can think of is that it doesn't have a very good battery life, but that could be just me, because I'm on it for most of my free time usually running a game like Grand Theft Auto: Vice City with Pandora in the background, so that may cause the battery to drain faster than normal.  Overall, the Kindle is an amazing tablet the perfect size for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Trading Up for a Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: The Psychologist
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Kindle Fire even though I have one of the original Kindle units and I must admit, I like the original Kindle for reading books better than I like the Kindle Fire HD.  True, the Fire HD provides a clear picture in color but the books are hard to stabilize for reading.  They always seem to be moving on to the next page before you are ready.  Of course, there is the reading rate setting but I find this useless, particularly if you are a person who likes to savor each page as you read.  It puts the reader into a speed reading mode.Probably the feature I miss the most from the original Kindle is the light which informs you that the unit has been completely charged.  The only way to know this on the Kibndle Fire HD is to turn on the unit and look at the display.  Not good,The features I like the best are the ability to play games, particularly Candy Crush and  to get my e-mails without booting up my computer or netbook.  I have yet to try the videos and music features but I am certain these will be helpful when travelling.

Reviews.Title: Very poor performance
Reviews.Author: Sahibjanich
Reviews.Content: This tablet is absolutely useless for media usage. Many apps are not compatible, if they do they work periodically, silk browser freezes quite often. If you want to use it for a reader it's ok. But as tablet as it's no good.

Reviews.Title: OK Kinde
Reviews.Author: Jacob "jake11205"
Reviews.Content: I had this kindle for a year and can safely say to stay away.Overall its an OK device. Battery is only ok, find myself charging it more often than I would like to, also the charging time is extremely long unless you purchase proprietary quick charger. Screen is very nice no complains there.Its difficult to upload files onto the kindle via usb cable ( I have mac and need to install a proprietary software that's extremely slow - 1 video file takes 60 min). There is a limited number of apps since the OS is locked into Amazon ecosystem, you can't download any of the apps from regular google app store, and don't have access to any of the google apps. Being that is a proprietary OS build on android troubleshooting can only be done by amazon. Recently because of some software glitch I couldn't access my music or videos I cannot stream videos from amazon prime which basically makes this a really overpriced kindle with a color screen which you can only use to read books. I spent over an hour on the phone with the helpdesk and was informed there is no solution to the problem and there is nothing they can do. I was promised that perhaps in few moths the bug is going to get fixed. I find this a deal breaker, if you lock your device to your own proprietary software at least know how to fix it. Spent over $200 bucks on device that doesn't work and was offered $10 credit  as a compensation for my trouble. What a joke. Stay away.

Reviews.Title: This is probably your worst option
Reviews.Author: Noah A.
Reviews.Content: First off, what is the reason to buy a kindle fire hd? Are you looking for a tablet? This is the absolute worst tablet I have ever used. The interface is junk, the amazon "store" is horrible, it lags constantly, and the bezel is much too thick. I feel sick thinking about how I got this as a present and never returned it. I have side loaded in various apps from my S4. I was happy to see that Google Chrome worked, except on the kindle it only supports the older versions of Drive and Gmail. This would be okay on a desktop, but it makes it so much harder to work on with this thing. Also the battery life is rediculous. I'm going to buy a Nexus 7 or iPad mini, they have so much more going for them and Amazon has done nothing to help the kindle take off besides throwing ads in everyones face. If you can't stomach Apple buy a Nexus or even better a Windows Surface, and if you like Apple then you have the iPads to choose from. I feel like its a chore to even look at it.CONS:No Background OptionsVery Bad StoreHorrible Interface"Clunky" at bestHeadache to do almost anythingBezel makes the screen look smallOnly a front facing camera? That actually blew my mindPros:Resolution isn't badThat really is the only "pro" I can think of, besides the overdone speakers.  Overall this is a horrible device that I so desperately wish I could return. I refuse to sell it, because of how bad it is. DO YOURSELF A FAVOR AND DON'T BUY IT.

Reviews.Title: Not as happy as I thought i would be
Reviews.Author: Erin Eastman
Reviews.Content: I bought my kindle HD 7 in Feb 2013 off of Amazon (and I sprung for the 32GB) the main reason bc I was doing a lot of traveling and the kindle held everything I was needing without buying a tablet...I could read, listen to music, play some mindless games and the weekly time that I had to get online I could use this verses lugging around my large laptop...as soon as I got it right away it was giving me problems...it would not connect to my email through the email app it came with...the internet kept going down or refusing to connect when everyone else did connect...I had to shut down and turn on constantly and the simplest things like checking to see my storage usage was impossible for my kindle (it showed me only the "calculating..." sign and still does to this day) and this was all in the first month...problems seemed to persist as it started freezing on me and refusing to turn off so I had to wait it out till it ran out of juice and hoped it would work...it became increasingly slow...settings I had placed on it for different apps I would have to redo multiple times...and when I was purchasing apps from the store during my internet time if I did not at least open the game while connected to the internet it would refuse to open later on in the week (even if the game did not need internet connection...like solitare...it would still do that)...and there were many more problems than that...after a couple of months on my weekly time for internet (that's right on average during my travels I got one day a week to go online) I used the customer support thing that is on my kindle and messaged them about all the problems that I was having...and yet I never heard back from them...nobody messaged me or attempted to give me tech support or help me with the troubles I was having....and to this day they still occur and new problems persist...now the one feature which has worked great and was my favorite has decided it to wants to join the not working party...the Dolby speakers were awesome but now over the last month they flicker on and off and then shut off and go to the basic sound...but if I click pause on whatever I'm listening to and then play again it goes back to normal with the Dolby only to do it again 10-30 minutes later...I may be the only one who has all these problems...maybe I got the bad apple in the batch, bc I see all these rave reviews and when I was researching this product it was getting great reviews and encouraged me to purchase it...but I'm frustrated with my purchase...I hope you all have a wonderful day and I know this is one review among many but I just needed to say my thoughts on it. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Chris P.
Reviews.Content: I have a 10" tablet AND the Kindle Fire and absolutely love the Kindle.  Nice size to handle and does everything a bigger tablet does.  Great game apps and I love downloading free books from the library!

Reviews.Title: NO CAMERA! and it stopped working after a month
Reviews.Author: Andre Bay "Andre Bay"
Reviews.Content: I bought the first generation, and I was happy with it, which has a camera....Then ordered the same product for my wife, and for my surprise it did not have a camera. I believe Amazon should make that really clear...who would expect the same product having less features on the second generation in comparison to the first??? Not happy at all!!!Review 2: DO NOT BUY IT!I am really disappointed as I would not expect a low quality product like this from Amazon....I've been a customer for a long time. A month and 2 days after the purchase this kindle stopped working. I've called Amazon, and we went through troubleshooting and it did not work. I'd like my money back. Can someone from customer help get in touch with me?

Reviews.Title: no camera
Reviews.Author: michael mulzac
Reviews.Content: Well for one I had no idea it didn't have a camera to it. I got it for my little girl and she makes a lot of videos. So when she opened it I seen it didn't have a camera and without that she doesn't us it as much as she uses mine. So I'm hoping I can return it for a full refund.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: kemelia  wanda tyson
Reviews.Content: This kindle fire is useless it won't charge .it freezes it jump. I wish I never purchase this kindle fire I.it a waist of money

Reviews.Title: pay attention
Reviews.Author: Kimberly McCord
Reviews.Content: Yuk! Be sure to read all print. No camera, thought that was standard.  Very generic.  Suitable for small children, or just gamers.

Reviews.Title: Not Great For a 3 Year Old
Reviews.Author: E.S.
Reviews.Content: We quickly returned the kindle fire hd 7 and replaced it with an iPad mini.  The menus on the Kindle are very confusing and inconsistent, unlike the iPad.  The lack of a hardware button to "go back to the home screen" resulted in my 3 and 5 year old kids getting "stuck" in unfamiliar menus and inconsistent apps with no reliable way of getting back to the main menu.

Reviews.Title: HORRID!
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Knauer
Reviews.Content: We bought 3 Kindle Fires HD for Xmas specifically because they had Parental Controls and we could limit the time kids spent on activities and when they turned on and off each day.  2 of the Kindle Fires HD's had the correct software version 1.4.27 and one had an older version 1.3.5 which does not have the start and stop times or the goals which is the whole reason we bought it over an Apple product.We called Amazon on Christmas day and after spending 2+ hours with a rep who knew nothing, told my husband to download an operating system for the wrong Kindle Fire and NEVER called us back to install!  We called Amazon a second time and got a second rep...he realized the Kindle fire we had was broken and agreed to quickly expedite a replacement.  Thought we were in the home stretch till we realized he sent the replacement to another address in our Amazon account and not our home!  Third call to Amazon and we got another nice rep who agreed to resend the Kindle Fire to the correct address and was able to reach the delivery company to get the wrong Kindle Fire returned before it was delivered to the wrong place.The replacement Kindle Fire HD arrived today, we turned it on and low and behold it has the same old software for FreeTime of 1.3.5 which was the issue we were replacing it to being with ....UGH!  Fourth phone call to the company and "J" who understands we are pretty much done....asks to try and force the upgrade wirelessly....I appease him and sit as we go through the process again of trying to have him force the upgrade to no avail.  Now we wait another 5 days for his tech department to figure out why we are getting Kindles with the old software.  So...if you ordered a Kindle Fire HD for Christmas I strongly suggest you check to see if you have the latest version of the FreeTime if you use that app it should be 1.4.27.  If you have the 1.3.5 you might want to make your own call...not that it will get you anywhere.1 week later, over 5 hours on the phone with Amazon, 4 customer service reps, 2 replacement systems and numerous mistakes....thinking I should stick to my Nook and iPad!

Reviews.Title: Its a 2nd generation tablet
Reviews.Author: sally harrison
Reviews.Content: Description didn't say it was a 2nd generation. Beware it doesn't have a camera!! So you can't Skype!!  I have the first gen tablet kindle fire HD and love it, 2nd generation not so much.

Reviews.Title: If buying for kids, be warned...
Reviews.Author: J. Bisset "jbisset"
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying I LOVE the Freetime concept that Amazon has come up with for the Kindle.  It's a wonderful way to help parents give kids freedom to enjoy their Kindle but control the amount of screen time they use playing games/videos and such.  However, the ONLY content that you can put into your child'd FreeTime account is content you buy from Amazon (and not all of that works either, ie Amazon Prime).  Library books don't work in FreeTime.  Amazon Prime books and videos do not work in FreeTime. Netflix does not work in Freetime. The reason I purchased the Kindle was to encourage my children to read but the only books they can read are ones I must buy from Amazon (which I occasionally do but as you can imagine it can get VERY pricey).I contacted support and they said it was planned in the next release but having searched online I saw the same reports back in early 2012 so don't hold your breath.  Once they make these changes I'm happy to change my rating to 5 stars as it really is a great device but virtually useless as a reading device for kids (if you want to use their highly promoted FreeTime feature).

Reviews.Title: faulty parental controls
Reviews.Author: Erica Rinear
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire HD for my granddaughter as opposed to the ipad mini because of the parental control option.  UNFORTUNATELY, when the control is activated, games that have an expansion component cannot be accessed! Thus, my granddaughter cannot play her games except on my daughter's ipad. My daughter spoke with tech support, who was LOVELY, but the guy said there have been MANY complaints about this issue. I am considering returning the device and going ipad mini after all.  A MEGA KINDLE FIRE FAIL!

Reviews.Title: Pre-loaded with my account details and not requiring my password
Reviews.Author: Jared Franklin
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift.  The customer service rep was kind enough to blame me for not choosing gift at checkout as to why they put my account credentials on the device and then never required my password to start adding apps to it.Regular Amazon customer service is great.  Say the word "kindle" and they transfer you to the worst group of people in existence.  Just from this experience alone I strongly suggest avoiding the kindle.  If you ever need any type of support you get customer service reps who are useless and blame you for everything.  I have never before been so annoyed with Amazon.  How they justify putting my login and password on a device and letting it be used without once asking for the password makes me livid.

Reviews.Title: My HD Nook was better
Reviews.Author: TMR, IT Specialist
Reviews.Content: Sorry but it did not meet up with my HD Nook.  Size is too small, speed was too slow, took over an hour to sync with my wireless router; touch screen was jittery; controls were not "user friendly" and for the 7 days that I had it I COULD NOT GET IT TO SYNC with my Cloud account, thus unable to read any of my books, kept saying that I "First had to buy a book... an app...etc"PROS: Is much lighter than my HD Nook; colors & pixels are better.  That's it.Will stay with my HD Nook.

Reviews.Title: Very Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Patrick Doman
Reviews.Content: I already ordered 2 Kindle Fire HDs a few months back and love those. But I just ordered and received a new Kindle Fire HD. This new one is the second generation which was not in the description as to which version it was. So I ordered the same Power charger with this one. Got the Items today to find out that this is the second generation Kindle Fire HD which has no Camera at all and comes with the Charger instead of just the USB charger like the other one. Why do you need to modify them so much and not put it in the description as to what you are really getting. Almost thinking of sending this one back but to close to Christmas now. Now I am also wondering if i have the Correct Case ordered Either. I wish Amazon would get their Crap together and describe what is really with their Products.

Reviews.Title: Not for the low tech elderly
Reviews.Author: JZS "JZS"
Reviews.Content: I need to preface this review and say that I bought this Kindle Fire HD 7 for a very specific purpose.  If you are an experienced user and are looking to compare to other products like the ipad, other reviews will be more helpful.I bought the Fire 7 for my elderly mother.  I wanted to be able to give her a wide variety of books from kindle with the print enlarged to audible books to mp3s.  A nice bonus would be giving her mp3 music.  Boy, was this a mistake.I can buy and load everything I wanted but after two frustrating days I had to accept that there was no way I could make this easy for her to use.Like many 87 year olds she has limited vision and is very intimidated by technology.  The touch screen "swipe" technology may look cool, but it makes it much too easy to accidently go somewhere you don't want to go.  Contrary to what is stated in the users guide- the navigation bar (with the "home", "back" icons) does NOT show up on every page and Mom would panic if she ended up somewhere with no idea what to do.Other problems-1)  The frigging carousel.  It might be OK if the setting on the "book" page limiting books to what was "only on this device" also applied to the carousel but it doesn't.  So everytime I added a book to my kindle keyboard it showed up on the fire's carousel.  Since I buy frequently the carousel would be tedious and overwhelming for her.  Yes, there is a way to delete an item from the carousel but that is above her skill level.2)  The "touch" is unresponsive on the audible books.  I had to repeatedly tap the "stop" and half the time it didn't stop just ended up back at the home screen with the book still playing.  I'm sure it was "user error" but it shouldn't be that hard.3)  The "app" tool bar names, "books" "music" etc, are close together.  The screen is so sensitive that you need small steady fingers or you are going to end up someplace else.  Not a problem for most people, but a little old lady...4)  User manual is awful.  To begin, I don't like manuals you can't scroll through.  If you pick a topic you can't continue through the manual.  You have to go back to the main page and pick another topic.  You can try search but none of the words I entered showed up.  What is there is sometimes wrong (see above) and often inadequate.  For example, I thought kindle free time might make this usable for Mom but there isn't enough info.  It says kindle free time locks the pad into "landscape" but doesn't say if you can manually change it to portrait.  What does the home screen look like if you set free time?  Is there a way to get rid of free time if you don't like it?  Will the child (Mom) need to enter a password?  None of this is in the manual.Sigh.  So I gave up and gave Mom my beloved kindle keyboard.  It is absolutely perfect for her although I can only load it with kindle and audible books, no MP3.  Perfect for an elderly person (although the free 3G web browsing is probably too difficult for most) but they don't make it any more. So I can only hope that I can find a refurbished one if this one goes.Will use the fire myself.  How is the Fire for me?  So far, eh.  I don't need a mobile device very often and use kindle for reading and book buying.  Like my keyboard,the web access will be handy when I travel but not really an essential.  And the screen is glass and looks it.  Many, many smudges but they don't interfere with viewing.The screen rotating is a problem when lying on your side to read.  The kindle tilts a little and wheee, tilting words.  I'm pretty sure I can lock the screen in portrait- once I figure out how to undo everything I did to make it usable for Mom.Update 12-20-13:  24 hours later and feeling slightly less aggravated  :-) so wanted to add information on positive points (and one additional negative) that might be helpful:1) The screen is very well lit and resolution is excellent.2) Sound on the mp3 albums is surprisingly good for a device like this.3) Connecting with our home wifi was a piece of cake (just needed to know password).4) I found instructions on locking the screen to "portrait" (searched the help forum. Sweep down from the top of the home page screen and on the menu bar that appears tap the "auto rotate" button.  It will change to "locked")5) You can return within thirty days even if the box is open.  I may reset to factory defaults and do that.
