Reviews.Content: i do not use that much about putting my old info on it ido not all about it  because i miss my old one

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HD 7"
Reviews.Author: Maria M. Ovalle
Reviews.Content: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE my KINDLE FIRE HD 7". I have not had any problems with it and I carry it with me at all times.

Reviews.Title: My First Kindle
Reviews.Author: Jon Becker
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning to use the tablet but found the reading text option which is the main reason for buying it....nice internet contact as well. I chose 'without options' but there seems to be a lot of advertisements...

Reviews.Title: BIRTHDAY PRESENT
Reviews.Author: Sr Shirley Le Blanc "GRITS"
Reviews.Content: I'M SURE I'M GOING TO LIKE THAT THE RECIPIENT HAS ONE OF HER OWN AND IS ENJOYING IT AS MUCH AS I HAVE MINE.

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: gabriella
Reviews.Content: It is a wonderful kindle I just ordered a case to go with it because i don't won't to drop it because i love it so much!!

Reviews.Title: Impressed again
Reviews.Author: Joshua Clinton
Reviews.Content: I have a 8.9' HD and decided to get my daughter a smaller one. She is young so freetime comes in handy. We have a leappad ultra also and I have to say the kindle is a lot easier to use, cheaper and stronger than the leappad. By cheaper I mean the majority of the apps for kids are free, including learning apps and doesn't have cartridges that can be lost.I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a tablet for their younger kids. With the right case, this is just right

Reviews.Title: I Love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Virginia R. Wilson
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire is everything I had hoped it would be and more. My daughter has one and she loved it so when my original Kindle died, she suggested I upgrade to the Fire. My daughter is smart!!!!

Reviews.Title: Cheap...Cheap Product
Reviews.Author: DeAnna Castle
Reviews.Content: Not as good as the original Kindle Fire's.  Cheaply made and operating.  The original Kindle Fire worked so much better.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price.
Reviews.Author: Arizona Paul
Reviews.Content: Great value for the price.  Use it everyday.  Do not hesitate to buy this item.  I have two now, as my wife used mine all the time so now we do not have to share for this price.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't download Adobe
Reviews.Author: John Sheehan
Reviews.Content: I  was unable to get a web site that I wanted the most, because I couldn't download Adobe. I couldn't get www. Tfnn.com

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: crznszn
Reviews.Content: As the owner of an aging first generation Kindle Fire, I took advantage of a great deal on the 7 inch, 16 GB Kindle Fire HD.  Although I didn't notice that much difference as far as picture/screen quality, (I haven't compared the first generation and the HD side by side, though) I love the extra storage space.  I enjoy playing games on my Fire, and my app storage on the first generation wasn't enough.  The HD has all storage space in one pot, unlike the first generation which had the storage divided.  I find the screen sensitivity on the HD better, and I think it processes commands faster.  I do question the decision to put the on/off button on the back.  Several times as I've been holding the HD, I've accidentally hit the button and had to wake it up and sign in again.  I do like having the volume buttons on the actual device instead of having to tap the screen to go into the settings to turn the volume up and down.  During my Amazon prime trial, I streamed some videos, and they played smoothly.  The picture quality was beautiful with bright, vibrant colors.  All in all, I'm very satisfied with my new Kindle Fire, HD. The Kindle Fires are the best big girl toys I've ever purchased.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: speeez
Reviews.Content: The only problem I had was finding the version. I ended up ordering the wrong screen protector and case that they will not let me return.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Ellen Lewis
Reviews.Content: I have not been restricted at all regardless of what I am trying to do.  I watch movies, netflix, hulu, prime.  I lisiten to several different radio shows.  I read books and play all different kind of games.  I have not had problems no matter where I am using my Kindle.  I did get a portable hot spot to carry along with me so I don't have to use WI-FI at other locations.  My little cousins 5 and 7 years old play games and I like the fact I can restrict their use if necessary.  I don't see a need to upgrade to the lastest version of Kindle, this work perfectly fine and I like that fact it is at $100.  I am now going to purchase one as a birthday gift.  One last thing, no more paper magazines, I have all of my past subscriptions compacted on this little device.  I truly love it.

Reviews.Title: This Kindle
Reviews.Author: Bev Kussman
Reviews.Content: It arrived  very quickly and we went and got a cover for it.  I only wish I could find free books to download to it.  I love to read!

Reviews.Title: What on earth...?
Reviews.Author: Norma Beishir "author, The Unicorn's Daughter"
Reviews.Content: I have a first generation Kindle Fire that's well over two years old, and, occasional minor glitches aside, still works great. My current Kindle, which was a Christmas gift, has more storage space, which I love--but it has developed a strange quirk I'm unable to correct. I use Kindles and smartphones because I have very poor eyesight. But now, my newer Kindle has dropped most of my app icons. I have gray squares and the app title below them in very small print. There seems to be no way to correct it.

Reviews.Title: This was a gift
Reviews.Author: Charles L.
Reviews.Content: She seems to love it. No complaints yet. This was an upgrade from another kindle classic. Only thing that I have found that it does not have a place to put removable disk for space,.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kathy S. Hall "Kat"
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle.  I have bought 4.  This is the best.the display is sharp.  Will probably buy one for Dad

Reviews.Title: kindle hd review
Reviews.Author: Paul C.
Reviews.Content: Worst tablet I have ever used for browsing the internet.  My original kindle was great.  This kindle hd is unusable because it freezes constantly.  I can't get 5 minutes of use without it freezing requiring me to power off to reset.  I have tried everything to get this to work on the in internet properly.  It is going in the trash and I will be getting a nexus to replace it.  It hurts to see the kindle go bc I loved the original one I had, but this one is unusable.  If not for the internet issue, the kindle hd hardware is very nice.See ya

Reviews.Title: loses internet connection
Reviews.Author: Etika Wesley
Reviews.Content: We got this to primarily use for amazon prime shows. We can turn on a show and it then it will just say no internet connection and turn off. We then power it off and back on and the show will work again for a while then repeat.

Reviews.Title: Great for reading!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Smith
Reviews.Content: I enjoy my Kindle Fire HD 7 for reading.  I am not a gamer nor do I use it to watch movies or TV.  The only thing I do not like about it is when I am going to the next page, it may go to dictionary or the home page or if I do want to get to the home page, I gave difficulty getting to that icon.  But for reading purposes, I do love it.  I especially like it at night- I can get up and read without having to turn on a light and disturb my husband!!

Reviews.Title: get it it is worth the money
Reviews.Author: Laura Schmitz
Reviews.Content: Parents said I got this for Christmas and when I found this I was so mad but this works great I have had it for about a year now.and still works great

Reviews.Title: It good, but limited Apps
Reviews.Author: Mike and Pam Wolfrey
Reviews.Content: I like the Fire HD.  It has a very vivid display and of course let's me access all my ebooks ordered on my Amazon account.  The problem I have is that next time I would probably by something like the Galaxy Tab that gives me access to more apps via Google Play and just load the Amazon Kindle app to read my ebooks.  But like I said, it's a great product as an eReader but I think it lacks functionality as a tablet.

Reviews.Title: This is an amazing toy
Reviews.Author: Joseph LiCausi
Reviews.Content: Very user friendly. Battery holds its charge. The screen stays fresh. Easy to watch movies on as long as you get the matching case.  The case to buy is the softer rubbery one. It keeps its toughness.

Reviews.Title: Nice improvement over previous version
Reviews.Author: Mary Bjerning
Reviews.Content: We are enjoying some of the new features of the Fire HD.  However, one thing that we don't like is the highly reflective quality of the screen.  Getting reflections can be very annoying.

Reviews.Title: nice system
Reviews.Author: Blanche Harrison
Reviews.Content: I love taking it to play games and read. the charge lasts a long time. I would recommend this product to any age. you can choose games and put parental controls so the content is appropriate. lots of fun for indoor or outdoor fun great for long waits and travel.

Reviews.Title: New or refurbished, it doesn't matter.
Reviews.Author: DonRam
Reviews.Content: These devices are pretty reliable, except for the charging port issue on the first generation. I love the upgraded version and it makes my kids happy when they are restless. Outdoors is a better option of course.

Reviews.Title: highly recommended
Reviews.Author: carla sloan
Reviews.Content: My desktop computer died. Could not afford a new one. My daughter sent me a gift card from Amazon. Bought the kindle and  it does everything I need it to do. Now I can check email and shop from my recliner!!  It is working out wonderfully.

Reviews.Title: Really enjoy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have wanted a kindle ever since they came out and I finally have been able to purchase one. Actually, it was a gift, but I have very much enjoyed it. It has met all my expectations. Keep up the good work.

Reviews.Title: Thank you
Reviews.Author: Robyn Wellfare
Reviews.Content: Fantastic purchase sorry I didn't buy sooner. I know it's going to be an extension of my arm from now on.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Amazing
Reviews.Author: Johanns Rogers
Reviews.Content: Pretty amazing device, preforms basic needs expected from a tab, great for reading. a bit heavy on the hand when lying down.

Reviews.Title: Great Kindle
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Brown
Reviews.Content: I bought my Kindle Fire for school and it is the best investment I could have made!  Renting books from Amazon and reading them on my kindle while in class is so much easier than carrying 40 pounds for books around. And for $139 it is cheaper than buying a high end tablet with more functions and power than I need.

Reviews.Title: Will not recommend.
Reviews.Author: phena
Reviews.Content: Very slow opening... Does not respond without several swipes.  Will not turn by turning Kindle.  Hard to turn off.  TOO HEAVY TO READ BOOKS COMFORTABLE..Will not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7
Reviews.Author: Lindy C Black
Reviews.Content: Love my new Kindle does everything I want it do.  It works better than my first kindle. Would like to trade my old? Thanks

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Marsha Brautigam
Reviews.Content: So far it has worked great! Does everything I had hoped it would without problems. Amazon customer service is absolutely wonderful! I cannot rave enough about how well I have been treated!  THANK-YOU!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7", HD Display, WI-FI 16 GB Includes Special Offers
Reviews.Author: PS
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my daughter.  she love it.  She uses it for all her online stuff.

Reviews.Title: Much Better Than My Second Generation Kindle
Reviews.Author: Michael Mr. S
Reviews.Content: The price of the KindleFire HD was just too good to pass up. The display is great and easily readable, and there are plenty of features that make the KindleFIre HD well worth the the price. Navigation has a little bit of a high learning curve but new users should not let that dissuade them from buying the HD. However, I have been having some trouble with the HD holding a charge; there have been occasions when the device would "go dead" with a 40% charge left, but this is after I have been reading for three or four hours. Maybe there is a connection. But then after three or four hours of steady reading, I am ready for a break--maybe the Kindle is as well. The upside is that the HD recharges very quickly. Conclusion: This is a good buy!

Reviews.Title: Love this tablet!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A. Wendt
Reviews.Content: This was a mother's day present and I couldn't be happier!! Love everything about this Kindle. It's fast and beautiful resolution! Can read, check email, download my favorite apps, it is great!

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: TwoChicsBlog--Crystal
Reviews.Content: This makes the 3rd Kindle that I have owned and my favorite so far. Amazon just keeps getting better! I use my Kindle almost everyday, for everything from reading to games to recipes and blogging.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Johnson
Reviews.Content: Nice, would have given 5 stars, but I dont like the special offers that come up & I dont know how to remove.  My grandkids love it.

Reviews.Title: Great for commuting or road trips
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Paquet
Reviews.Content: Love the kindle I download movies,music ,and games.. can take it on road trips. Good entertainment when commuting to work long distance in vanpool

Reviews.Title: Live and learn even when "bringing up the rear."
Reviews.Author: anita saffran
Reviews.Content: It does all it's asked to do and more than I knew about.  I need a hard copy direction booklet and don't think I should have to purchase one to discover other skills of the Kindle.  The on-line instructions are cluttered and difficult to read.  A true 0n-line tutorial would be a blessing as I could read it , subject by subject, without having to go forward and backward.  I still have to get used to not holding my book as I immerse myself in the joy of reading but I'm sure I will.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: DARYL  HICKS
Reviews.Content: I had been reluctant to buy an e-reader but this is soooo much more.  It's almost a laptop. I prefer the screen size to do many things I use to do on my smart phone.  I'm an avid reader and my Kindle Fire is easier to travel with than carrying several books.  I recommend  this especially for people that do a lot of traveling.

Reviews.Title: Blows my prior Kindle out of the water
Reviews.Author: Diana Wilder "Diana"
Reviews.Content: The screen is easy to read - not a lot of glare (how did they do that?)Nicely portable (though I do recommend getting yourself a padded holder for it to avoid scratching).The internet accessibility (where you have connectivity) is very good.All in all, an excellent development in the Kindle line.  I am not sure how this could be improved, but I'm sure those people are working on it.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: The Angerhofers
Reviews.Content: I have this Kindle and have gotten a lot of use from it. I gave it for a gift, and the recipient was very pleased.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: dede Peoples
Reviews.Content: I have a lot of pros and cons about the kindle. Let me start off with what I like. I like the display it's really clear and it also easy to Download things. So the things I don't like are that it didn't come with headphones. I also dont like where the charger port is because it can easy break.This kindle doesn't have a camera either. I also at first had a problem with my kindle restarting because I had a case on it. Once I took it off it stopped doing that.

Reviews.Title: my Kindle.
Reviews.Author: Phyllis Bennett
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my Kindle. I downloaded free apps with no problems, I play games and watch movies. I love it.

Reviews.Title: battery life
Reviews.Author: c.dunlap
Reviews.Content: This is my third kindle fire. The first one lasted two and one half years.  The second one lasted about three weeks and I returned it. This one only last about five hours on a full charge.  I have contacted kindle customer service and reviewed my settings and everything seems to be set properly.  I have kept track of my usage for three days and have determined  the best battery life is on less than five hours.  My first kindle I used on an average of 8 to 10 hours.

Reviews.Title: didn't like side jacks
Reviews.Author: MR BANKS 1
Reviews.Content: The headphone and the USB jacks where at an angle and could easily break but the kindle other than that was the same

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire Delivers
Reviews.Author: Lynnie Phillips
Reviews.Content: A friend recommended Kindle Fire and they were not wrong.  I like seeing the covers of my books and being able to download games had been a great stress reliever.  Being able to check my emails and search online is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Helen Mortimer
Reviews.Content: This is my second kindle clearly quite a few improvements. Really great products and I use it all the time.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: N. Marsh
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this Kindle.  I'm having lots of fun playing solitaire and other games.  It's very convenient to use.

Reviews.Title: summary
Reviews.Author: L. D. Braun "baby love"
Reviews.Content: the "SPECIAL OFFERS" included have yet to be revealed to me.  I am still wondering where I can find them ...or at least what is offered.

Reviews.Title: My Choice for a kids tablet.
Reviews.Author: Adam Herrera "Adam Herrera"
Reviews.Content: About time. I needed a tablet for my 5 year old child. She got mad and broke her last one, but did the kitten eyes and cried; of course daddy had to go find her another one. I really didn't get mad at her breaking her Kurio, that thing was slow, crashed a lot and was frustrating.The parental controls were more trouble than they were worth. This Kindle Fire was the next best adoption. I like the parental controls on it. I like that I can push out downloads to it. I like that I can see what she is doing and plus so much more. The game selections are awesome and we take turns playing it, lol. One big plus was Amazon Prime, I decided to likely buy the membership after trial, my child has found lots of t.v. shows she likes on it, plus it has books and all kinds of goodies. Maybe next year i'll get her the HDX one so she can Skype me while i'm off on a business trip.I work in IT and from an IT prospective for the price range this is my kids choice tablet. Avoid the "children" tablets out there, they all are worthless.Also, 8GB went by fast, I should of bought the 16GB one. I paid $200 after taxes and extended warranty at Best Buy.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Peter Campbell
Reviews.Content: Amazon made it right when they made the Kindle Fire HD. I am super happy, this is my 3rd kindle and it gets better every time.

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Par "Par-Daron"
Reviews.Content: I had no idea exactly how Kindles worked, short of them being e-readers, a new world has been opened. During an illness, I used my Kindle after having it for over 3 months. It had so much to offer, games, Internet access, facebook, I was extremely pleased. The Kindle is a mini-computer, it keeps me entertained for hours. The charge lasts well and recharges pretty quickly. The speakers are not as clear, as I would like them to be [I am a music/audio person]. I look forward to buying an upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Just want the Skpe to work
Reviews.Author: Becky Capps
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my Kindle HD but really wanted it to have a comparable Skype to like I have on my computer. Just want the Skype to work

Reviews.Title: Great Electronic Equipment
Reviews.Author: Dennis Dunkins
Reviews.Content: I can say that I absolutely enjoy my Kindle.  It allows me to down load my favorite books and read anywhere I am located.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: C. A. Honeycutt "choney"
Reviews.Content: I can do so much with this little tablet. It is so convenient and has everything I need when I am on the go. It is so much nicer to have to it to read a book wherever I go than carrying a bag full of paper books. Wish I had gotten one sooner!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: jesse foo
Reviews.Content: It had everything that I neded in a small tablet. The main items were having access to email, being able to read Kindle books and be on social media. The apps got me there.The Silk interface is a little clunky and slow but absolutely light speed ahead of the cheaper tablets.

Reviews.Title: Works just as i had planned
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Just what I expected. Works just as well as i expected it to.  Not disappointed at all. Only issue was with charger cord

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: S. M. Thames
Reviews.Content: I like this Kindle because it is easy to use and is the right size for the hands of grandchildren.  The large number of Apps keeps interest high and keeps the kids busy. I recommend this to any one of any age.  It covers the gambit for multi-generational interests.

Reviews.Title: Great Kindle
Reviews.Author: Cat p
Reviews.Content: It's a great electronic item and I love everything about it so far. I have just got this recently so haven't been able to explore it all yet. I would recommend this to anyone interested in kindle's.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Betty harth
Reviews.Content: It is hard to set it up to borrow books from the library. Sometimes It freezes when trying to borrow a book. Other than that I love it.

Reviews.Title: THE BEST PART OF MY OPEN HEART SURGERY EXPERIENCE!
Reviews.Author: R. Crutchfield "Shudda stuck to READING!"
Reviews.Content: A friend suggested I order a Kindle Fire just before I had open heart surgery in April.  Next to the doctors, it saved my life!  Read several books, watched, via hospital wifi, Netflix movies, kept up with my Facebook and Email and even played some games during my recovery and rehab.  Still reading away now that I am finally home.  Friends have sent me gift books - instant download - because everyone now knows I am reading more than ever due to the long recovery process.  Such a bargain compared to all those tablets out there!  LOVE IT!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle and Case
Reviews.Author: grandma
Reviews.Content: Grandson really loves his Kindle and case.  Plays games on it.  It is easy to use and good size so he can easily use.

Reviews.Title: Great gift for Mom
Reviews.Author: Happy & Pleased!!!
Reviews.Content: Purchased this Kindle Fire as a Mother's Day gift, and my Mother loves it...  As long as she's happy I'm great.  It's small and fits in her purse very happy.

Reviews.Title: love it glad I purchased
Reviews.Author: Angela Christie
Reviews.Content: I'm still trying to set up what I need to down load could use more help to see what is already on my kindle fire hd.  But I love it glad I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: 8gb? Really?
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: It works really well, tons of apps, cool design. It's an awesome tablet, I gave it 4 stars because you don't get to use the 8gb it says, you only get like 5 and that was disappointing to me,

Reviews.Title: Kindle for Kids
Reviews.Author: Lori Shields
Reviews.Content: These are great!  We bought 2...one for each child.  They can read books on them, play games, watch movies, etc.  Great for in the car, weekend trips, stormy nights (without power), etc.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect.
Reviews.Author: Patricia Nelson
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying this could be user error.  I can't get it to play my facebook games like Farmville 2 or Bubble Witch, which was what I originally bought it for.  I have downloaded every version of Flash Player available and none of them are the right one.  HOWEVER, I just took this little jewel on vacation where it more than made up for it.  I can access my email, I can cruise on Facebook, I can read books and play games.  I'm almost embarrassed to give it four stars because it has performed so well and really needs five stars for doing what it does well, but the Flash Player deal is a little frustrating.  I'll get over it!  I'd buy it again.  Great price and the special offers aren't an issue.

Reviews.Title: Suggestion
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: It's greatJust like to have a little start up infoI know it can be found but written directions help

Reviews.Title: Kick'n
Reviews.Author: M. S. Jordan
Reviews.Content: Kick NOOK's ass.  More features and easy of use is a bonus. Rock'n product. A must have for frequent travelers.

Reviews.Title: I've become an addict
Reviews.Author: Brenda Shriver
Reviews.Content: If anything happened to my Kindle Fire HD, I would probably go into withdrawal.  I absolutely love it. Thank you very much for this quality product.Brenda

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Mary Zawacki
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle. It is everything I wanted and more. Very easy to navigate. Super easy to purchase reading material.

Reviews.Title: Fire is incompatible with many IOS and Android apps.
Reviews.Author: Dan Bernitt
Reviews.Content: Amazon has made too many incompatible modifications to the operating system (Android?).  IOS and Android have both become popular platforms for applications.  When I bought the Fire I expected at least most of those apps to work plus new features from Amazon.  Very few of the programs do work however and that is a big mistake in my opinion.The same mistake was made many years ago by IBM, by the way.  Perhaps they and Amazon thought they were big enough and popular enough that the world would follow.  At the time personal computers were controlled by the Dįsk Operating System (DOS).  Xerox, not Apple as many people think, introduced a graphic system and IBM rushed to make a new graphic system to replace DOS.  Their OS/2 was not compatible with thousands of programs that had been written for DOS.  Bill Gates wrote a graphic system called Windows which was at least upward compatible (at leaśt had a DOS) and that spelled the end of OS/2.

Reviews.Title: Instructions for using the Kindle
Reviews.Author: Gladys Thomas
Reviews.Content: There were no instructions on how to start using the kindle. That is, where, and how do you start receiving/and or ordering Books?

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Hayden
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed in this item and actually returned it to you.  I replaced it with Kindle Paperwhite for the simple reason I couldn't read the Kindle Fire out doors.  The paper White is great.

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: R. Dugan
Reviews.Content: I received the Kindle Fire promptly.  I'm very technically oriented so I expect it to be some time before I'm able to master all the things the Kindle can do.  I'm relying on friends and amazon to help me learn.

Reviews.Title: Always shutting down
Reviews.Author: natiboo
Reviews.Content: I hate how there seems to be a system update every other week and it automatically shuts the tablet down for 2-4 days. It's pointless to have this tablet if I can't use it on a daily basis without worrying about if it's going to stop working. I use it to keep my nieces and nephews entertained and it's hard to do that when it's down for system updates. If I could stop the system updates from updating automatically, I could handle it but until then this tablet is not worth it

Reviews.Title: Oh, yes, I love it!
Reviews.Author: Gevrah
Reviews.Content: Exceeded my expectations by far - there is no comparison between this and the old Kindle.  Worth the extra money.

Reviews.Title: Would buy again and again!
Reviews.Author: Laura R
Reviews.Content: By far the best choice of tablet for a kid! We love the parental controls and variety of apps and books. We use it to rent public library books which has saved us lots of money on gas (we live 20+ miles from our nearest library) and late book fees!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: stefvz3
Reviews.Content: Love the kindle. Works wonderfully. Great color on it. I only wish it had a camera. My 9 year old loves it.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: I wanted a dedicated e reader and the kindle more than lives up to expectations, great product and very well made.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Roxann Balonek
Reviews.Content: Did not come with any booklet or paperwork. Had to figure out everything for myself. Otherwise it is great and I really like it

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: What can I say - its a kindle!  I bought this as a gift for a 9 year old.  He loves it - he can play games and read on it, and his parents can set time limits for both.  The only problem with kindles are their durability - easy to crack the screen

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: C. Kramer
Reviews.Content: I love it.  It does everything an iPad does except take pictures for a fraction of the cost.  I do prefer my basic Kindle for reading because there is no glare.  I'm very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: fire hd 7
Reviews.Author: petunia
Reviews.Content: I've always wanted one and I'm glad my friend talked me into it.  I enjoy it most traveling and when we go camping.  I don't feel as though I'm cut off from the world.  It's easy to use, entertaining , and informs me of everything I want to  know.

Reviews.Title: it works....
Reviews.Author: pearl Cooley
Reviews.Content: My old kindle fire died. So I needed a replacement. This appears to be working fine. The quality doesn't seem a good but that's just me. My old one was 3+ years and was heavier made. But I'm sure they changed a lot in that time...

Reviews.Title: A++++++++++++++++
Reviews.Author: NA "bush2004"
Reviews.Content: Excellent item and highly recommended. The charger could use some work. Have had them go bad and stop charging the kindle. just had to spend $30 on a new one.

Reviews.Title: Kindle is Kind!
Reviews.Author: Brenda B. Ready
Reviews.Content: I had a Nook that died; I liked it.  But I find that the Kindle is easier to navigate and especially like the dictionary.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7" ROCKS!
Reviews.Author: Dianne Haines
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HD with the 7" screen. It has clear sharp images and is easy to navigate and easy to read in any light. It is wonderful!

Reviews.Title: In love!
Reviews.Author: Sherry Keeley "shrykeeley"
Reviews.Content: I don't think I've been more in love with a piece of technology.  I LOVE LOVE LOVE this product.  This may be influenced by the fact that it's my very first tablet but nonetheless, I don't think I could be happier.  My main purpose for purchasing it is for reading ebooks.  I was using my large Android - which worked well - but between my music cateogory, all my apps and my books, the storage on my phone was shrinking; I was getting worried about losing content (even though I store in multiple locations, including cloud storage, I always seem to lose SOMETHING when technology finally dies).  So I bit the bullet and bought a Kindle Fire HD 7".  I have been very impressed by Amazon across the board so I figured I'd stick with their brand - if I had a problem, I knew they'd support me on it.  In addition, the price was amazing ($139) and combined with the special deals they're offering, I thought I'd finally buckle and join the tablet world.I know other reviewers have said this one falls short of previous models and/or previous generations but, again, this being my very first tablet, I love it.  It's really simple to use (especially for a first timer), I LOVE the sound when I have it docked to my stereo (for some reason, it sounds evey better than my "Beats" Droid) and I find myself carrying it around everywhere I go!  I'm hooked.My one mention of unhappiness - maybe it's just me, but using the origami case (I bought it with the Kindle), I find that somehow I'm putting pressure on the case in just the right (wrong) location and I continually hit the on/off button.  It's a bit frustrating and I'm trying to figure how to hold the unit differently.  If I was to purchase this again, I would definitely try a different case.  But otherwise, I can't imagine ever buying a different type of tablet!

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: QA Joe "j"
Reviews.Content: boots a bit slow but handles apps and video downloads quickly.  The HD version has great clarity and depth of picture.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HD 7
Reviews.Author: Afrah Alowaydhy
Reviews.Content: Since I bought this kindle the charge has problem . It is turning off suddenly and turn on back after awhile  . After 3 months it stopped to work .. I really don't like that ,,coz I don't know where is the problem with this bad quality of product . I don't recommend any who looking for the good quality to use this kindle .

Reviews.Title: Nice Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Consumer Helper
Reviews.Content: I like the screen and believe this is a solid offering for a tablet. Of course the wi-fi works great and no matter where in the house you are it seems to connect without an issue. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Deborah Mastenbroek
Reviews.Content: Bought for my son who's autistic/aspberger, so really didn't need ALL the bells and whistles, just a few.  He really only wants to play games on it.  It suits him just fine.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Grisham lover
Reviews.Content: This tablet from amazon is awesome for the price. It plays all of my internet hulu, netflix and amazon prime and other amazon videos excellently. It does not have much storage but is enough to put a good amount of cds from my prime cloud on here. I still haven't figured out how to put other music from my computer on here but nevertheless a great buy for watching the entire internet! ;)

Reviews.Title: Kindle Nice Cheap and Easy To Use
Reviews.Author: Charles Leduc
Reviews.Content: For person who does not want to spend lots of money to have a tablet type unit of checking email, Facebook, and watching movies.  Not too many bells and whistles, but I like to keep it basic.  I could have bought the IPAD but I don't need to spend that money if I'm only going use 10% of what it can do.  This is also a good option for first timers and kids without the huge investment.  Plus I'm Amazon Prime and can watch Amazon movies on it.  Amazon customer service has also always treated me well and that's why I'm loyal.  Good products with exceptional service!

Reviews.Title: I Love It
Reviews.Author: Harry H. Husted
Reviews.Content: I love the touch screen part. Sometimes it can be a little sensitive, otherwise, it works great. I've been using it for Kindle books for now. Looking forward to seeing how videos look.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HD is the best!
Reviews.Author: arnesimp
Reviews.Content: I already had just the regular Kindle Fire and I really enjoyed it.  However, Kindle Fire HD is so much better.  Everything is magnified and much more room.  It's Awesome!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is my 5th kindle and I really like it. My only complaint is the lack of an SD card slot.  The first kindle had a slot and it made organizing content so much easier then they discontinued it.  To me that was a major boo-boo and still is even more now with the Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: kindle firbe hd 2
Reviews.Author: genea
Reviews.Content: Love it.  My old Kindle Fire died after hard use.  I think it was fine except for the plug.  Anyway,  Amazon gave me a discount on replacement.  I had a number of choices.  This one suits me perfectly.

Reviews.Title: I really love this tablet.
Reviews.Author: Forest By The Sea Lady
Reviews.Content: I ordered a Kindle Fire HD for my mom who is 79 years old and resistant to technology. When I saw how nice it was I ordered this one for myself. I enjoy it for games and short emails and using the internet. Also like having my music and audiobooks on it. And have even viewed some movies on it. I really like it a lot.

Reviews.Title: Kindle 7hd
Reviews.Author: catherine smillie
Reviews.Content: I am still trying how to get use to using it but it seems like I will enjoy it . Thanks

Reviews.Title: I'm in love!!!
Reviews.Author: Paula Adams
Reviews.Content: This is such a wonderful & versatile device. It has so many different functions!! As I get to know more about it & how to use it, I'm more & more impressed. I love to read, but don't have time. Whispersync & Audible are the best!! Videos are so crisp & clear. This has become my best buddy. The price is low for so much fun!!! Thank you Amazon

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 8 GB Review
Reviews.Author: Sally Nelson
Reviews.Content: I have resisted an e-reader for a long time in preference of print materials.  There was a growing list of reading material only available in Kindle format so I reluctantly purchased a Kindle Fire.  I love it.  The display is perfect, images are crisp and I will definitely upgrade in a few years to a larger screen.  Downloads are simple both from the Amazon store and through Overdrive from my local library.  It is easy to carry with me so that I have reading material whenever I am stuck waiting somewhere.  The Kindle Fire is easy, reliable and convenient.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Present
Reviews.Author: Beth Peters
Reviews.Content: My grandchildren now have their own Kindle Fire. No fights now. Cases were bought so everyone has there own color. They were so excited at Christmas when they opened their packages.

Reviews.Title: little disappointed
Reviews.Author: ladyl
Reviews.Content: I am prob in the minority but I love my plain old kindle so much. It was easy for me as tech challenged as I am,to navigate. Not so much this one.the "support"group is not always helpful(Wanda was)if you cannot understand them and they don't know what you are talking about then they should not be on a support group(can you say overseas)I bought this so,when I go away,I could access my e-mail and this was the hardest to figure out. If my old kindle was not freezing so much I would have sent the fire back.I was glad I got it for a special price but in future I will stick with the original one,hands down.

Reviews.Title: love the kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Desire
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle!! I had some issues with my initial purchase but customer service was very helpful and I haven't had any other issues!! Best birthday gift ever!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd Kindle I bought. Now my 3 youngest children each have their own. Great tablet for kids.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: D. S. Snyder "constant reader"
Reviews.Content: I am a late comer to thinking I needed a "device". I thought  I did not need, nor would I really use, a tablet with online capabilities. I was SO wrong!! I carry my Fire with me in my purse at all times, and use it at any odd moment. I love the ability to check my email, look up a recipe while shopping, comparison shop, or read thru the day.I am SO pleased, I purchased one for my husband for his birthday and he also really uses and appreciates having it.The screen clarity is astounding. It is easy to use and understand, and the "Mayday" feature is unbelievable and so handy!!!I am very very satisfied!!

Reviews.Title: kinle fire hd
Reviews.Author: DEBI
Reviews.Content: we have our first kindle fire, and we loved it, so the kindle hd was a good choice for us.  it has more gb's and we download 'thomas and friends' movies for our grandson!

Reviews.Title: great performance
Reviews.Author: karen t. harper
Reviews.Content: I sent this as a gift, the recipient loved it. However the gift card was not included. She had no idea who sent it until I called her.

Reviews.Title: my grandson  loves this
Reviews.Author: bernice  lea
Reviews.Content: my 10 year old grandson  got this for his birthday.. he loves it. cann't hardly get it out of his hands.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Pam Fries
Reviews.Content: I got this purposely because I wanted to play games, Facebook games to be specific. The description talked about being able to play games, so I thought it would be perfect and in my price range.  Was I in for a shock and massive disappointment.  I felt so ripped off and cheated. It plays games alright, but not any that need Adobe-all the good ones.  Apparently you can not get Adobe on the Kindle and there is no way that I can do to get it on there.  I wasted money. There were some cute kids games, so my grand daughter uses it for her games when she comes over.That teaches me to do my research better.  BUYER BEWARE.

Reviews.Title: great price for a great kindle fire
Reviews.Author: K. Johnson
Reviews.Content: This kindle fire does all that I want it to do and at a price that cannot be beat. I even called customer service to ask a question and they were the best customer service people to deal with.  my problem was solved.

Reviews.Title: Love mine
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Young
Reviews.Content: I have been so surprised that this tablet can do so much.  My small laptop died and was going to cost $180.00 to fix it.  Instead of fixing it I bought the Kindle Fire.  It is so convenient to tuck away in my purse while traveling.  Love to read on it while waiting for appointments, etc.  I have had no trouble with it freezing or shutting down.  I would definitely recommend it,

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT❤️
Reviews.Author: ann c webb
Reviews.Content: I Love my Kindle ! I can slide it in my purse and take it everywhere . I am very happy with book selection from Amazon and I love to read! I also like shopping on it and browsing it is all the tablet I need. Very happy with it I bought Kindles for 3 grandchildren and they love them and happy I finally got one for me!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: kendra lucas
Reviews.Content: At first I did not like the kindle, but once I got the hang of it, I love it.  Of course, I have nothing else to compare it to because this is my first.  But why buy anything else, when I like what I have.

Reviews.Title: Awesome.
Reviews.Author: MaribelleZ
Reviews.Content: I love this little notebook. Its fast, easy to use, and just what i was looking for. I'm very happy to have it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7", HD Display, Wi-Fi, 8 GB
Reviews.Author: Gregory G. Rautenberg
Reviews.Content: We love our Kindle Fire HD 7", HD Display, Wi-Fi, 8 GB and couldn't be happier with the purchase or service.  Thanks!!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Teresa M. Quint
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I purchased this during their special offer sale - you just can not beat 90 bucks! Sure the screen saver shows advertisements but one swoop and it is gone. This is a great basic tablet. I am just figuring out all that it can do! I love the quality of this device. The ease of use. What I don't like is that I have to close out a screen or go home to open a different page. But heck - that isn't so bad considering how great the device is.

Reviews.Title: I absolutely love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Robert C. Alvarez
Reviews.Content: I love that I can take my collection of books every where I go. I travel on business alot and my kindle goes with me every where. The screen is vibrant and nice size. Picks up on WI-Fi really easily. Charges quickly, and has tons of space for my hundreds of books.

Reviews.Title: Kindle random shut down and does not open for days or never
Reviews.Author: Barbara  sheehan
Reviews.Content: I really love the Kindle Fire HD based on the fact that I had a regular Kindle Fire. The biggest problem that have occurred on both Kindles is that they randomly shut down.The older Kindle will not charge even with a new charger. Because of this problem, I bought the Kindle Fire HD. After a week, the new Kindle shut down and even after charging it would not open. About a week, the Kindle opened. A am very frustrated and annoyed that I played for the second Kindle and it seems to have the same problem as the first one.Thank you. Barbara

Reviews.Title: Good value for price - Quality issues
Reviews.Author: Usha Bhamidipati
Reviews.Content: This is a value product with lot of additional software features. I personally brought this product for Kids time that limits how long your kid can use tablet for. While it did keep up with all expectations in terms of performance & ease of use, the product has light bleed issues. I was offered a replacement  which is even worse. I ended up keeping the original one and send the second one back. I wish they really had a better quality control on their products. I have so many touch devices and this is the first time I have noticed a light bleed on a touch device.

Reviews.Title: save your money
Reviews.Author: Joyce Lindner
Reviews.Content: Wish I never purchased this Kindle, continues to lose connection and emails to Amazon are futile. Battery life is only a couple hours so I need to use it plugged in, I guess you get what you pay for so my next purchase will be an I-pad.

Reviews.Title: Bluetooth Pairing
Reviews.Author: Ronnie D. Yapo
Reviews.Content: I had the original Kindle Fire and really enjoyed the product. This newer version 2nd generation is much better than the 2 previous and I looked forward to the Bluetooth connectivity, but that's where it comes up short. In Bluetooth mode it shows the device I'm trying to pair but fails to connect. Followed the troubleshooting steps and in the amazon basic troubleshooting steps it shows Advanced Audio Distribution Profile (A2DP) that it supports which my device. I called the help desk and basically after finding out what device I was using, the tech said that it will not work. So basically I'm happy I wasn't on a lengthy call, but I feel that Amazon should detail that it may or may not work with some A2DP devices where on it's site it says that it does support it. Other than that, the Kindle Fire HD 7 is a good product, but still needs work with it's Silk browser and of course the Bluetooth.

Reviews.Title: It was exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: FT
Reviews.Content: I enjoy reading and the Kindle Fire HD fit the bill.  It also allows me to access my email accounts and other web pages.  I highly recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: A complete smart pad for a nice price
Reviews.Author: Daniel Gille
Reviews.Content: Very nice looking screen and the device has a good responce time. It could have been a little lighter as I use it mostly for reading.

Reviews.Title: Fun
Reviews.Author: Nancy Peter
Reviews.Content: I am loving it  but would like more instructions with the games.  Guess I am older and it doesn't all come naturally for senior citizens.  A booklet would have been nice with the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7
Reviews.Author: stitchwitch
Reviews.Content: My Kindle Fire HD arrived in time for my vacation.  Was easily portable and I could send & receive my e-mail without the bulk of a lap top computer.  I still have some learning curve but It has met my expectations.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: D. Niemeier
Reviews.Content: All of us love this. We watch / play / read it often. Item was in condition as expected and there were no troubles with it.

Reviews.Title: Reading  More
Reviews.Author: Chris Reicks
Reviews.Content: I started out slowly when I got my Kindle.. and now that I am more familiar with it I read it almost every spare moment!  I love it....Soooo glad not to have all those paperbacks not lying around the house anymore!

Reviews.Title: bad deal
Reviews.Author: richard
Reviews.Content: I bought this kindle Fire less then 4 months ago,, can't see it out at the pool.. it has really bad WiFi reception.. and now it the screen just comes up saying : Kindle Fire" after I have downloaded a bunch of book on it. Amazon I'm done with your products. this is my fourth Kindle and my last. I would not but this EVER EVER AGAIN..

Reviews.Title: New generation of Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: E. Barden
Reviews.Content: I gave it 4 stars because the new Kindle Fire HD 7" doesn't have a camera now and you can't watch it thru your tv anymore via a cable. I still think that the Kindle is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Wife's gift
Reviews.Author: desertdragon
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife for Mother's Day. It came quickly and she's enjoying it now after a bit if work to change from her older version.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great device, software is subpar
Reviews.Author: BN
Reviews.Content: Got device for my spouse. She enjoys it a lot and uses it mainly for reading.At some point we needed to install an app to read digital magazines from our library.  It got complicated quickly.  Not intuitive at all. Once you invest a few frustration filled hours, I guess it gets better.  So, it was still a good purchase, just not a 5 star product (software design is a drag). The product itself is very nice in that it's very light and has an attractive design.

Reviews.Title: Instructions Missing-
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Wolf
Reviews.Content: I always wanted a Kindle Fire, but as yet--I have no idea what to do with it...  It just sits unused !!!  I feel it was a bad purchase for me.  Just wish I knew what to do with it.  I do recommend it to anyone who knows how to work it.  How do I go about finding instructions for it's use???

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: ironthis
Reviews.Content: We bought it as a gift for our teenager. She loves it and uses it everyday. We look forward to using it on vacation.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: RuthAnn Brunsting "Taffy"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire.  I use it for reading, keeping in touch with my family by email.  I read my favorite books and also watch my favorite movies!  I've purchased a few Kindles for my family as gifts.  Great size for my purse, too!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: JoAnn Shinn
Reviews.Content: The Fire is everything I expected it to be, it lives up to the hype, which is unusual nowadays.I recommend it for anyone who wants the best.

Reviews.Title: Happy 8 year old
Reviews.Author: herman miller
Reviews.Content: The reputation of Amazon, Kindle and favorable pricing made Fire HD an easy choice. Easily handled by my 8 year old great grandson.

Reviews.Title: Gift for father
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: I got this for my dad as he has never used a tablet before. Old school and all. He loved it and it was shipped fast and in great condition!

Reviews.Title: love, love, love
Reviews.Author: MsSweets
Reviews.Content: This fire is so awesome i am in love with it. Its easy to get around, would recommend it to any and everyone.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Emmyjo
Reviews.Content: I love it so far. I like being able to read samples of books on it. And I like that I can watch movies if I want to.

Reviews.Title: Thought I would be able to do more
Reviews.Author: Jennifer A. Ryan
Reviews.Content: Part of the problem with these devices in MT is that I can't always find a Wi-Fi connection & when I do, it can take several attempts to get permission to link to it.  The Kindle itself doesn't come with many instructions & the "help" function is anything but.  Lots of frustrating trial & error to figure out how this thing works.  One of the big things I wanted to do with this was watch movies from Hulu, but unless I subscribe to Hulu Plus, I can't do it.  The HD part keeps me from watching the free shows.  So far, I've been able to check email, look at FB & read one book - not exactly worth the $129 I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: Reviews on new Kindle
Reviews.Author: Debra D.
Reviews.Content: Excellent!!  this was an excellent choice to replace the defective kindle.  All my books are there and loving the reading time again!  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Kim T
Reviews.Content: This is actually my second one. My wife and I both use this model and love it. The price is affordable and for us it does everything we want it to do.

Reviews.Title: A very good tablet.
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Hamilton
Reviews.Content: Having been used to an iPad, I was unsure about how well I would like the Kindle Fire HD 7", but the more I use it the better I like it.  It is great for reading, has excellent sound, good colour and fine definition.  So far I have found no drawbacks.

Reviews.Title: Stop working after 1 month
Reviews.Author: JUAN CARLOS BELTRAN ANGULO
Reviews.Content: i got one  in best buy and after 1 month It will not start any more and does not work any longer. Do not buy this product

Reviews.Title: Fantastic device
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Excellent tablet for it's price and age. Does a great job with books, apps, music and web surfing. Charges quickly and runs for hours.

Reviews.Title: No speakers for input
Reviews.Author: Laurence W. Evans "Health-herbal.com"
Reviews.Content: I did not think of this until using it, but the Kindle Fire HD 7" has no speaker for input. Some interactive games require voice input. Anything needing voice input will not work. Also it needs wifi - you have no option of using a sim card and data bundles to access data away from a wifi source, so again certain software will not work away from a wifi source too.It stubbornly sticks to its book format, so you need to install the common pdf reader - that automatically finds all pdf on the tablet - the result being that I tend to use the pdf reader more than the Kindle software.Some android games - quite a few so far - install, but will not run on the Kindle.So in summary, its limited universality means I would not advise anybody buying this - there are other android tools with far more to offer in terms of what they can actually do.On the positive side, there are a multitude of free apps for the Kindle (off the Amazon site) - and books - that make the purchase worthwhile. My 8 and 9 year old daughters are having great fun with the numerous apps, drawing, painting, dressing etc. From this perspective is has paid for itself.

Reviews.Title: My kids love their Kindles but
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Richard "jkr1013"
Reviews.Content: I have only one complaint that comes with the Kindle:  why in the world is the charger access be angled? It is so awkward!!!!

Reviews.Title: switching
Reviews.Author: frances main
Reviews.Content: Sometimes the page I'm viewing disappears and another one pops up.This has happened when I'm writing an e-mail.Very frustrating to lose the e_mail..

Reviews.Title: Just love it
Reviews.Author: Glen_diaz
Reviews.Content: Just love it! i have the kindle touch but this oone is waaaay much better! Totally recomend it, both of them.

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle Yet
Reviews.Author: Debbie Garner
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Better than the basic Kindle. Lots of options. Would recommend to anyone looking for a deal.  Great!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Jeanette Smith
Reviews.Content: Like it a lot love if I need help amazon calls me right away. Don't like the hassle of not knowing all prime membership does

Reviews.Title: Meets My Needs Perfectly
Reviews.Author: James Strickland
Reviews.Content: Great little instrument. Meets my needs perfectly. Highly recommend this product. If you have a older Kindle, upgrade to the Kindle Fire HD 7".

Reviews.Title: First one was better - too bad it went wonky.
Reviews.Author: bitsy sue
Reviews.Content: I liked my first Kindle better - which came as a surprise.  The old one had a "glow" button while battery-charging that this one does not.  The keyboard on this one sometimes requires drastic measures to get it to respond.  I would consider sending it back except that it's very inconvenient to exchange - I'll never get back all of my wi-fi codes back, especially since the program has changed & it's much more difficult to access that information with the new program.

Reviews.Title: Still learning
Reviews.Author: K. Magoto
Reviews.Content: Time doesn't allow me to learn many of the features, although I know enough to navigate through.  It suits my needs.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: Tabitha Y.
Reviews.Content: was a great value for the price. gave these as prizes for employees, they loved them. would definitely buy over ipad minis.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Viljoen
Reviews.Content: Light , easy to handle, good quality, bought for grandson 13 years old, is being used in SA, connects well

Reviews.Title: Its Okay for an Entry Level Tablet
Reviews.Author: Linda S Robbins
Reviews.Content: The Kindle is okay. It is not as good as the previously released one. The reason that I say that is there is no camera, and the feel of the kindle just seems cheap and plastic to me. It also lags quite a bit and the only apps that I have on there is Planner Plus, pintrest, Houzz and Next Issue so there shouldn't be a lag. But this would be great for a child or a someone looking for an entry level tablet.

Reviews.Title: worth the money
Reviews.Author: Paul F. O'Connor
Reviews.Content: I like y\to read and this is perfect...don t have to but hard covers anymore (costly) and if you keep your prime membership they cost $0...only drawback for me is that my favorite author (as far as I can see) is not in the prime directory.I camp and this is perfect for me...finish a book..load a book

Reviews.Title: not as good as 1st one
Reviews.Author: karen bowman
Reviews.Content: I will say I was a little disappointed with this fire it seems smaller to me than the first one and heavier to me at least. but on the plus side it has a much sharper picture. but it you are thinking of buying opne I would buy one of the newer ones.

Reviews.Title: LOVE!
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle Fire HD as a Christmas gift in 2012. I've had it for 2 years and still love it just as much as the day I got it! I use it for everything, way more than my laptop. So far no problems with my Kindle at all. I would recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Niccole L Mardis
Reviews.Content: I have held off on buying a new Kindle for years...I am so glad I did. i love my new kindle. It is so much more than I ever expected!

Reviews.Title: Be careful.
Reviews.Author: Nicole Harrison
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my 13 year old daughter for her birthday. She loved this tablet. This tablet has an incredible picture. The only problem with this tablet is the glass. My daughter dropped hers by accident on on kitchen floor and it shattered to pieces. There is no replacement glass available with this generation kindle. We had to buy new kindle. Be careful with yours.

Reviews.Title: Don't Waste Your Money
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Pam"
Reviews.Content: I I bought a new Kindle after my older version died.  The older version was fantastic.  I expected the same quality in the Kindle Fire HD.  I was so disappointed.  I had it a couple of months before it started shutting down for no apparent reason.  I called Amazon to inquire what might be wrong.  Customer service suggested that the battery reader was not functioning properly and the charge was wearing down.  That is not the case.  I receive a message when it is shutting down for the battery.  I went online and it was suggested that maybe the case I had contained a magnet that was affecting the charge.  I bought a new case.  That didn’t work.  I would spend a day charging the Kindle, only to have it do the mysterious shutdown.  I went online again and saw others complaining the amazon even replaced their kindle with another one, and they still have the same problem.  I have no faith that amazon could fix the issue, and I cannot in good conscious give it away because it is so inferior.  If it worked the way it was suppose to, it would be great.  A friend bought me a refurbished Samsung Galaxy Tablet that functions so much better.  I have not had a single problem with it, and it was cheaper than what I spent on the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: No tv connection
Reviews.Author: Bank Of America "Detail Pete"
Reviews.Content: I bought his tablet so that i can connect it to my hd tv using a hdmi but this table does not have any hdmi connection. and also I couldn't use a external sd card. The purpose I wanted is to use to connect to a tv through hdmi and also to insert a sd card to view and show photo to other poeple of my photos cause im a photographer. I ended returning it.

Reviews.Title: Worst Tablet Ever
Reviews.Author: Jacob Stankowski
Reviews.Content: they suck... a tablet that has ads that you cant take away... its the dumbest thing you cpuld by... Save up and get an ipad... trust me

Reviews.Title: my experience with the kindle fire HD
Reviews.Author: Liahona Workman
Reviews.Content: Never in my life had I used a computer before and my first experience with the kindle fire HD has been fantastic. I had to learn everything from the start . Email, music, books, pictures, Facebook, Pinterest etc. I am 75 years old so it proves that you are never to old to learn. I could not have done it without kindle support, they have been so very patient with me. I am very appreciative to everyone that has helped me and I have recommended this product to a lot of people. I can hardly wait until I can afford the never one so I can have better pictures. I have to be patience. Thanks for everything and everyone that has helped me.liahona Workman.

Reviews.Title: Kids love it!
Reviews.Author: A. Costa
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these for my two kids, 6 and 8. I really bought it so I wouldnt have to keep spending so much money on books at barnes and noble. They love it and use it moslty at night when they want to read themselves to sleep since it is backlit nicely. Even though it is really more suited as a reading tablet than anything else they do have fun playing games on it as well. works flawlessly, fast, and is very nicely priced.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: MJK
Reviews.Content: I bought a Kindle when they first came out. It seems strange how much they have changed. I love the Kindle Fire. Although I have a laptop, I can also use the Kindle fire as a computer, as well as a reading device and for playing games. Glad I purchased this product.

Reviews.Title: I bought and returned it.
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Orig "OrigMedia.com"
Reviews.Content: I bought it and returned it.  I love the pure Android experience.  This is far from it.  NO Google Play Store.  You are stuck with very limited apps that Amazon has designed.  Their silk browser has no private viewing.  You have no Gmail app, no Google Drive, etc.  if you want a cheap tablet with good hardware, this is ok.  But I would recommend finding a pure Android tablet.Plus, Amazon is trying to sell you stuff at every turn.  It's kind of annoying.  Everything is an upgrade to use a feature that is free on a pure Android tablet.

Reviews.Title: My first Kindle Fire and the price was great
Reviews.Author: Lee Ann Walters-Young
Reviews.Content: I have had an Acer Android 10 inch tablet for several years now and have noticed it has had som glitching issues when I use the tablets keypad so when Amazon offered me a chance to buy a Kindle Fire with HD display for $89 it was hard to pass up on this chance. The ease of use with set up and synching with your amazon account is flawless. I loved having it "Know" me and link to my already massive book listing so I can see what I have out there on the cloud.  It was also refreshing to see the new kindle as an option for downloading new books to without having to add the device.The major issue that I have with this product is that I can not download certain apps from the Kindle store- for example, other book reading software, other internet browsing apps- for example internet explorer, Nook, etc. I understand the other reading apps but there should be some leeway for other browsers besides SILK.  Overall, it fits the bill and the price was perfect.

Reviews.Title: Patricia's Kindle
Reviews.Author: Patricia. Ann Breshears
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my Kindle Fire, I read books I also play games and other things. It took me awhile to get use to it, I am 77 years old and my generation is not very savvy with electronics, but it is great once you get going.It is easy to charge and very comfortable to hold. The only thing I dislike is that it needs to be charged pretty often I would like it to have longer time between charges...

Reviews.Title: I really like the Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Elaine Henderson
Reviews.Content: I choose the 5 star rating because it is so easy to use and download what your looking for. This was the best thing I have purchased in a long while. I would recommend to everyone I know. Great product

Reviews.Title: Enjoying it so far
Reviews.Author: Zach B
Reviews.Content: I don't know what I can say that hasn't been said already. Good device, good battery life. Just wish it ran the standard android software. The customized version is not the best.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: Great product, good graphics, does a great job for me.  I love the colors and the fact that I don't need a back light to read books.  Nice for videos and games.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding value!
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Far exceeded my expectations. This is the 5th kindle that we have purchased. Would recommend the kindle fire hd to anyone.

Reviews.Title: HOW CAN YOU GO WRONG?!?!
Reviews.Author: Night Reader
Reviews.Content: I purchased a kindle fire for a charity auction after getting one for Christmas and loving it. They last forever and the quality is second to none. Plus, how can you beat the lending library?!?!

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: Karen Doran
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle. I have the original one but it died on me so I got this instead and I have already read 5 books on it.

Reviews.Title: I recommend buy
Reviews.Author: Modupe  Hendricks
Reviews.Content: I have own the Kindle fire HDX 7 inch for about three months and enjoy it immensely. I owned the first generation Kindle fire 7 inch and the second-generation 9.8 inch. This is the best Kindle fire for reading books. I would recommend buying the Kindle HDX with the most memory you can afford especially if you’re like I am and do not like to delete the books you like from your Kindle.  I have a large collection of these books in the cloud, and have found it easy to retrieve those folks.  I have also found that this Kindle recharges faster than the prior models.

Reviews.Title: xmas gift for granddaughter
Reviews.Author: Clark J.
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my granddaughter for xmas.  Son had fun setting this up for her, hoping she uses this for long time.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Stephen May
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for an old kindle hat finally died, this does so much more and I am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great upgrade from the older Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Kevin McKenna
Reviews.Content: This unit is faster in response and has a more vivid screen presentation.  The side controls are user-friendly and intuitive; all-in-all, this unit worth the upgrade cost.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Brooke shepler
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my mom for her birthday was exactly what she wanted I've bought two of these love them

Reviews.Title: excellent for reading and for basic tablet operation
Reviews.Author: Dejan Dajkovic
Reviews.Content: excellent for reading and for basic tablet operation, good value for money, simple for usage, easy access to applications, recommended to other users

Reviews.Title: Replacement Kindle is Great
Reviews.Author: Raymond J. Lauenstein
Reviews.Content: My new Kindle does all I could ask of it and is superior to my first one. Color is great and sound is very good.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: The kindle fire hd was over priced when I purchased mine.  The price was reduced because a newer version was released.  The video quality while watching netflix is horrible.  But if you purchase a movie through amazon the quality is perfect.  My daughter has the nook hd and does not have that problem.  The internet speed and quality is slower than the nook also.  The nook has voice search and the kindle does not.  The only thing that works great on the kindle is the amazon site and the speed at which you can download books.  I am disappointed because of the cost and I just expected a better product.  If you just want to read get the paper white kindle.  If you want a tablet do not purchase the kindle fire hd.

Reviews.Title: Great reader...much improved over my original kindle.
Reviews.Author: Lisa Bull
Reviews.Content: awesome...I have really enjoyed my new kindle fire hd.  It is much improved over my first and second kindles.  Love it

Reviews.Title: An improvement over the Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Sherman Jones
Reviews.Content: Nice and slim....but get the proper cover to make turning it off and on more easier. The biggest improvement (and there are many) is the return of the included Text Reader! It does have trouble playing certain web site videos.

Reviews.Title: good for school but wished battery life was longer
Reviews.Author: Mallorie
Reviews.Content: I bought this for college so I didn't need to drag my laptop around and its good for pulling up lecture notes.  I wished the battery life was longer though, only major complaint.

Reviews.Title: Love it11
Reviews.Author: Judie Hathaway
Reviews.Content: I believe I will be rediscovering this 'toy' for a long time. there is a lot to explore. Very exciting addition to my life.

Reviews.Title: Another win!
Reviews.Author: PHATV
Reviews.Content: Got my wife the original Kindle Fire a few years ago at Christmas. She and the kids love it, take it everywhere, works great with amazon prime. Got this HD model for her b-day earlier this year during a sale and she loves it even more when watching video and such. It really is amazingly clear HD. I will say that. The girls got her old one, win-win for the family. Anyway, highly recommend. Great product.

Reviews.Title: very good kindle
Reviews.Author: vince c
Reviews.Content: meets all expectations, for the price.  works great. good pixels on display. it also has great  music sound great  thanks vince

Reviews.Title: would buy again
Reviews.Author: Tracy Whitt
Reviews.Content: Love it can find anything I need just like my desk top but a lot more mobility would recommend it

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: really love it.  except I can't get a favorite game I had on my old kindle....Thread words. Also I'm wondering if this is what I'm know seeing in ads for $30 to $40 less?

Reviews.Title: GREAT little Tablet!
Reviews.Author: T. A. Willis
Reviews.Content: This was a gift TO me from my son.  I bought my son a Kindle, years ago, because he is such a voracious reader....He loved his and has continuously upgraded as new  editions have become available.  I have always enjoyed a laptop, but......fell in love with his Kindle when I realized it was so much more than a  book reader!  It is light, easy to carry in my purse, and convenient entertainment or reference(research) source, whenever I need one.  I LOVE that I can use it for the internet, nor to just read a book....it is great for carrying recipes into the kitchen, when I cook, playing games or reading while waiting in the Dr's office.  My 3yr old grandson watches movies on it and the older ones watch videos on U-Tube or play games......I thought the 7 inch was going to be too small, but it is just right for me!  LOVE IT!!!

Reviews.Title: I do love it
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: I rated it only 4 stars because I am having trouble using it to its full capacity. I guess I am not as tech savvy as I thought.  I downloaded several apps but seem to only be able to play solitaire and once in a while I can go to Facebook. I will keep trying to make better use of it. I can read my books of course and with the wifi I can order them from my Kindle Fire, instead of having to use my computer. If you have any tips for me, I would  appreciate them. thank you,Mary Barkman

Reviews.Title: Exceeds all expectations!
Reviews.Author: Aaron Hill
Reviews.Content: bought it for my kids, they seem to love it! smooth operating system, good parental controls! haven't even filled up all the space yet.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: BR
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive and does the job.  I mainly use it to read and internet.  Battery life pretty good although I haven't watch any movies or anything on it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD :)
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: I Love it, my kids love it. It's better than Kindle Fire. It's shaped a little different but it works. Never had a problem with Amazon.  :)

Reviews.Title: Faunty Fire
Reviews.Author: Carol Baldridge
Reviews.Content: The Kindle fire that I received had a glich in the software.  No matter what I was doing, it would shut down and then re-start.  If I was reading a book, when it re-started it would come back 25-20 pages back from where I left off.  I sent it back for a refund.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle is a great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Marivel Creighton
Reviews.Content: I have an IPad, but I love my Kindle. It is so user friendly that even my mother, who is 83 years old, enjoys it!

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE!
Reviews.Author: kitkat_60
Reviews.Content: This is my first Kindle and I absolutely love it.  It's quite an adventure discovering all the cool things it can do!  Great product!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Peter D Schneider
Reviews.Content: Love my new Fire and read it at least 5 days or should I say nights a week. Great to use and easy to travel with. Love the size and easy to balance with a cover on my chest sideways.

Reviews.Title: Yay kindle
Reviews.Author: J. Doren "sylvia"
Reviews.Content: I love my new kindle as much as I did the old one.  Kindles are so easy to use. I love to read so I have alot of books on it.

Reviews.Title: on/off and volume buttons
Reviews.Author: Doug Arnold
Reviews.Content: These buttons are in a bad position when in the horizontal position, but with the size of the unit, I don't have any ideas where else they could be put.

Reviews.Title: I like the kindle
Reviews.Author: alex:)
Reviews.Content: because it's fun to play on!Yes because they would like it and play on it as much as I do.I do like that it has all the apps you have on the slide thing I don't like that you can't take pics

Reviews.Title: kindle fire bwowser pro lems
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: Great for lots of uses but after six months the browser becomes unusable. Silk bogs down after five minutes of use, read books, watch movies, use apps, but don't expect to browse the internet. The only suggested remedy was to force stop silk which makes the problem worse.

Reviews.Title: The fun kindle with so much to offer, my Fire HD 7
Reviews.Author: Kris L. Hoffman
Reviews.Content: This kindle is so easy to read, I like to rtad awhile in bed before going to sleep and this makes it easy to see even with the poor lighting 'in bedrooms. It has so many applications on it and I am sill learning but I really enjoy it. The color is vivid and it is simple too operate. Five starssays it all.  Kris.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work without wi-fi connection which is not available.
Reviews.Author: Tommy G. Smithers
Reviews.Content: Doesn't work without wi-fi connection which is not available.  No idea why I need a password, but the Kindle will not accept my password and I have no idea  how to get whatever I need.

Reviews.Title: Easy and Reliable
Reviews.Author: RJ
Reviews.Content: While not the best way to title this review, I couldn't be happier with the Kindle.  Starting with the original Kindles, the family never had one fail.  This most recent version was a gift to upgrade one of those original devices.  The flawless ability to purchase or rent content and then seamlessly install it on the Kindle is a big plus, not to mention the tremendous selection available.  In many respects I actually prefer the Kindle to my tablet.

Reviews.Title: Used Kindle Fire HD with Special Offers
Reviews.Author: Angel Wings
Reviews.Content: My now 1-year-old loves to play with her grandmother's Kindle Fire, so I bought this used 7" Kindle Fire HD for her first birthday. Even though the seller said that there were minor ware on the item, I didn't care, since this was going to a 1-year-old. For the price of $64 plus tax it's a lot better than $129 new. A child's tablet is pretty limited and isn't as good as the Amazon Kindle. The Kindle arrived the day after her birthday, which is today. When my daughter saw her Kindle, she smiled big and was ready to play her educational Apps.The seller said that the Kindle had some imperfections from ware, but I didn't see any. The Kindle looked brand new than used. I have never seen used items look brand new. I am pleased with this Kindle Fire. I'm now thinking of buying another used Kindle for my 9-year-old son for Christmas from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Learning to use my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Mary Dahl
Reviews.Content: I ment to press the 3rd star because I am having a real problem figuring out how to get from one app to another.  I want to buy more books, to get on the internet to my emails, look at all the books that are available at Amazon and only get a few and since I  did not get any instructions with my Kindle Fire, well you can see how I feel.  I've been using computers since 1984 and I am computer savvy.

Reviews.Title: Pleased
Reviews.Author: A. Shokes
Reviews.Content: Excellent! Everything I expected from an Amazon product. Have had a couple of instances where the browser shuts down unexpectedly, but no real issues.

Reviews.Title: A Great Device
Reviews.Author: Mylgon
Reviews.Content: I am a casual tablet user whose needs for a Kindle Fire were purely based on convenience and accessibility. That considered, the 7" Kindle Fire HD exceeds any expectations I had and the result is one happy Kindle owner!Meant to replace a decrepit couch side laptop, my Kindle is a stay-at-home device with the purpose of having quick access to sports scores, social media applications, and internet access. To each of these, the Kindle Fire does extremely well and performs with a level of efficiency that I was lacking from the expensive and aging Dell.Installing and managing apps is super simple and accessing them in quick fashion is overtly satisfying. The layout is very streamlined and, most importantly, it makes sense! With a Kindle, there is no need to search aimlessly for what you need - instead, everything resides where it logically belongs and navigating the menus is a breeze.The picture quality is - as you would expect from an HD device - fantastic; the sound is darn good for the size of the speakers; and, the device's response to the touchscreen inputs is spot on.At this level of affordability, it is simply amazing what the Kindle Fire does. For a very long time, this will be my go-to device when sitting at a PC just isn't ideal.
