I highly recommend a Kindle Fire to anyone who wants entertainment and information ready in hand and just can't swallow the thought of paying big bucks for those other pricey tablet devices.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7", HD Display
Reviews.Author: Nancy S.
Reviews.Content: Love it! Still trying to figure it all out.  Can't wait to try a movie on it.  Love the special deal that I got.

Reviews.Title: kindle hd 7
Reviews.Author: amanda carter
Reviews.Content: I am a big book lover and was always curious about readers and tablets but hesitant about getting one. I finally got it and have loved it ever since. I don't know why I didn't get it sooner. It has all the features I want in a tablet and still makes an awesome reader.

Reviews.Title: Birthday Gift
Reviews.Author: Tammy  R Schneider
Reviews.Content: Got this for my husband for his birthday because he is such a reader.  He loves it!  He uses it everyday besides reading he is checking the new, the weather etc.  Best gift I could have given him.

Reviews.Title: have fun with my kindle
Reviews.Author: william j romanowski
Reviews.Content: My first kindle l find it easy to use. Fun to buy all my book and my magazine easy to read.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Colette Blankenship
Reviews.Content: Was worried since I had never had a tablet before.  Easy to use, better than expected.  Supposed to be a gift for my son, but I liked it enough that I couldn't help it.  I kept it for myself.  It was perfect for my needs since I regularly shop on Amazon.  It's so much simpler and definitely more light weight than loading around a laptop.  The special offers are barely noticed even though I have had some to perk my interest, so no problem there.  All in all I am very pleased with MY Kindle Fire 7.

Reviews.Title: Met our needs
Reviews.Author: J Thomas
Reviews.Content: We finally decided to move into the "tech arena" by purchasing a Kindle Fire HD for Christmas. We wanted something for web surfing when the computer was in use, watching some shows, a few games, and some ebooks. After several months it has met all of our needs, with the possible exception that the battery doesn't seem to quite match the manufacturer specs. But it may be just the way it is being used (certain apps, etc)

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Theresa "Theresa"
Reviews.Content: Great for reading books, watching movies and anything else.This is not an ipad but I love it.  I replaced my keyboard kindle with this and would definitely buy it again.  I don't have a lot of apps on mine but there seem to be a ton available.

Reviews.Title: 2 nd one
Reviews.Author: James Keefer
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Access to web, books, magazines, etc. Works perfectly for what we wanted.  This is our 2nd Kindle- one each of us.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: butterflyhmr
Reviews.Content: Great ! Got it for my daughters 8th birthday and she loves it! My husband wants one now too! Love kids  friendly features and controls!

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Lois Piermattei
Reviews.Content: Haven't  had the Kindle long enough to judge.  Still finding out about it.  I do not feel compelled to write a review just because you say it is required.

Reviews.Title: The kid likes it
Reviews.Author: Lee A. Bailey "steel_lee"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my 30 year old son. He says that he likes it a lot. He is using it get on the internet and also for books. If he is happy I am happy.

Reviews.Title: Like very much but not sold completely.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Beautiful screen since I'm use to a paper white. The drawback is the battery life is poor. I have to charge every night. My first kindle which I still use would stay charged for weeks. For reading I would recommend the kindle paper white and not the kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Entry Level Tablet
Reviews.Author: Upsetter27
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the Kindle Fire HD 7 for a friend and it is an excellent entry level tablet especially at the sale price of $144 for the 16 Gb model with "no special offers". It has a great screen and picture quality and surprisingly good audio too. It has most of the important basic apps available on my iPad or I imagine on most android tablets. But make no mistake, this is not a "work" tablet. It is an entertainment tablet and it serves that function well. It's good for email, Facebook, Netflix and the like. My friend is learning how to use it without much difficulty. I did the basic set-up and it was all pretty smooth. I would recommend it for children and for novices.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Cheryl R. Holland
Reviews.Content: My Kindle Fire is a life saver.  My computer broke down and I needed to make a bank transfer, so I just got out my Kindle and 1,2,3, transferred the money.  I just love it!

Reviews.Title: Teaching an old dog new tricks
Reviews.Author: Dennis Cavanaugh Jr
Reviews.Content: I am learning how to use this tablet. Its Wifi allows me to check email while my Grand daughter is using my Desktop. I am using the free Kingsoft Office and the word completion feature is nice for a slow typist like myself. My fingers are too fat for the keyboard so I often hit a wrong key or word.

Reviews.Title: Would not buy again
Reviews.Author: bookworm Jo "bookworm Jo"
Reviews.Content: I purchased my kindle right after Christmas.  I love it.  I love the way it is set up, and use is all the time for reading.In April it starting shutting off when the power was less than 60%.  I would have to plug it in to get it to turn on.  I called CS and they had me do a reset and take it out of my magnetic case.  Nothing seemed to work, so I called back and explained the issues again.  I was told they would replace it.  I asked specifically about a new one and told the rep, even though the warranty said they could send refurbished, I wanted a new one.  The rep said they would make sure to note that so a new one would come.  A refurbished one came anyway.  I called and was told that the first rep should not have told me that, and that they would not honor what I was told.While I love using my kindle, I will not buy another one due to the refurbished policy and the company not honoring what I was told.  When a device has issues within four months that is not caused by the owner, they should replace it with a new one or at least honor the word of their rep.

Reviews.Title: very satisfied but...
Reviews.Author: Jarrett
Reviews.Content: Apps, theres a lot of crap here, a lot of apps that cost money then ask you to pay more to unlock the full version, is amazon not monitering this? Apps is a big part of the kindle but a lot is not offered here, I have had problems with the device turning off on its own now and then, not a big deal but a little annoying but other then those things this is an amazing device especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: This tablet was more than I expected I just hate that there is no camera if it was then I would be ecstatic

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: What's NOT to love?!?!  Price was excellent.  Quality is excellent.  Even downloading other apps are a breeze.  My most confusing moment came when I looked for a "Close All Open Apps" task.  Being used to Android I was under the impression that closing all apps will speed your tablet up. But this NOT a necessary step for the New Kindle Fire HD.  I also LOVE the ability to add Kindle Coins to your account for purchasing apps, MP3s & books.  Gives me the ability to maintain an Entertainment Budget. LOVE MY NEW TOY...gave the original to my mother and created yet another "KINDLE JUNKIE"! ♥

Reviews.Title: kid friendly
Reviews.Author: Heather Mattox
Reviews.Content: Love this tablet. Bought for my son's 6th birthday and couldn't be happier. Customer service was great at solving the minor problem (on our end) that we had. Would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: 2nd generation kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Sharon Washington
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire!!!!!!!!Its so easy to use and I take it everywhere with me!Upgrading to my new kindle fire was so easy!Thanks cs

Reviews.Title: presents for Christmas
Reviews.Author: Alfred D. Wallace
Reviews.Content: I have the older kindle Fire. I love mine and the folks I gave these to for Christmas love them as well. My niece seems to have trouble remembering to charge hers up, but we love reminding her that she forgot something simple.

Reviews.Title: Like New Is a Perfect Description
Reviews.Author: judy u
Reviews.Content: It was up and running immediately and it is so easy to use. I love the apps I downloaded to get email, text, and surf the web on my home wi-fi. Definitely thumbs up on this provider's product.

Reviews.Title: Present
Reviews.Author: Chriztofer Bonkerz
Reviews.Content: Not disappointed at all this was quality meets price. My sons mother loves this but she still loves real books more. This just makes very convenient

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Leah Rafferty
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is heavier than my first one, but has offers much more. One thing I found, that I can't read outside in the bright sunlight with this one.

Reviews.Title: Perfect tablet
Reviews.Author: Molly L
Reviews.Content: I wanted an inexpensive tablet, I tried other brands in this price range and they were so SLOW you could barely even get online most of the time let alone surf the web so I ended up returning them.  This tablet has been great!  I haven't had a single problem with it, it's super fast on the net, and the picture is incredible.  My husband has an iPad which has a bigger screen, but otherwise this tablet is equal if not better for less than 1/4 of the price.

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE it!!!
Reviews.Author: B Moore
Reviews.Content: What did I ever do before without it?????......I am so organized now and what a time saver!!!  After being organized, I have time to read or enjoy games!!!!

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: char
Reviews.Content: i have the orginial kindle for reading, because i like to read outside. you can't do that with the kindle fire. but i can't play games with the old kindle. so now i have the best of both worlds.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely wonderful!
Reviews.Author: rev. Leonard
Reviews.Content: I purchased my second Kindle Fire HD for my wife to use.  She is totally blind, and the features on the second generation model have her absolutely enthralled.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD (2013 Version)
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: As far as Kindle tablets go, how can you beat them?So, I'll review my tablet (2012 model) vs. this one (2013 model).Pros: The 2013 comes with a 5W charger (2012 didn't come with a wall charger - and USB charging sucks). Power and volume buttons larger and more clearly labeled.Cons: The 2013 model does not have a mini-HDMI port! 2012 did, and cost whopping $2 for a cable that hooked the Kindle to the TV. 2013 model requires a certain TV, OR a $60 conversion box.... Major feature loss for 2013 Model IMO.Other than that, they are about the same.

Reviews.Title: nice real nice
Reviews.Author: madearlove
Reviews.Content: great easy getting started love the new format  easy registration fitted last charger glad I did not have to make a new purchase on that

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: sharon
Reviews.Content: The only thing that I do not like is the battery life seems to be very short, otherwise I love everything else about my kindle fire it's wonderful and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Very enthusiastic about this tablet
Reviews.Author: Happy Guy
Reviews.Content: I'm a pretty critical user (but more so when I'm paying Apple prices).  My girlfriend has the full size iPad 2, which I enjoy using, but find to be very heavy (and it cost us over $650 with cellular).  I bought and returned an iPad mini (lots of small disappointments and a pretty hefty price).  I expected to try and (probably) return this tablet (newest Kindle Fire HD 16 GB), but that's not going to happen.  I love the thing and if it were lost today I would buy another one without a moment's hesitation.  The only things I really miss are the SD card slot and the HDMI port.  Why doesn't Amazon just give us what we really want?That said, the screen is incredible.  The browser is really usable.  The reading pane is brilliant!  I watch a lot of You Tube videos and this is my go-to device.  Battery runs down pretty fast.  We charge this one multiple times a day, instead of the once every couple of days we charge the iPad.  On the other hand, we're using the Fire more, because it is lighter and more comfortable to hold.Why don't they make any decent, moderate price cases for this thing?  I carry it around in a cheap iPad mini case I bought before I decided to return that one.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HD
Reviews.Author: betty meador
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle. It's everything I thought it would be .Thanks and this is the second one that I purchased .

Reviews.Title: Pretty great tablet and an amazing reader!
Reviews.Author: Charlene D. Clark
Reviews.Content: I am really happy with this tablet that I got for my 18 month old daughter. I think that this model should have had the camera standard. I also should have opted out of the special offers especially since it's for a child - she keeps touching the adds which is frustrating for me. She has already learned to use it easily tons of free apps and they're easy to download. I thought she was too young for this but with supervision it's working fine. I use it for movies, social media, shopping and of course reading - I love it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Fay Williams
Reviews.Content: I love especially being able to play the movies for when I travel. Love the color and extra possibilities. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Really Really like my Kindle Fire �❗
Reviews.Author: eufreakadeb "peace!"
Reviews.Content: For an all around easy to use tablet, it rocks! and thanks to Amazons pay it out option i was able to afford to purchase one..... finally!! Thanks Amazon�

Reviews.Title: Use it for what it's for
Reviews.Author: sarahjim
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire is not meant to be a web browser, calculator or alarm clock...those are all available though. No, the Fire is meant to be your go to device for streaming your PRIME VIDEO content, HBOGO, NETFLIX, HULU, XFINITY...etc, etc, etc. If you want high quality video at remarkably lower price than competitor tablets, this is the device for you. The quality of the sound and picture is equal to, if not superior to the iPad. These are great for kids as well because they offer easy to adjust parental controls. If you're wanting to try a tablet, and not break the bank, this is the device for you.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: R. Dunn
Reviews.Content: This tablet is all it advertises to be and a really great buy for the money.It is much faster than I expected and the wifi range could not be better.

Reviews.Title: Now obsessed with reading.
Reviews.Author: Leslie Kyle
Reviews.Content: Did not put any games on it.  Just appropriate books and gaming a thing go the past.  Obsessed with reading

Reviews.Title: Perfect for our Applications
Reviews.Author: teetertotter "teetertotter"
Reviews.Content: We had a Sony reader and recently Sony turned their books over to KOBO.  We loaded some Kobo books the past two weeks and had formatting issues with some.  They were very kind and issued credit, but if this was always going to be an issue with Kobo, I did not want to deal with it.  I called Best Buy and have had this new Kindle Fire HD for 4 days and came w charger.  This item is what the doctored ordered at less price at Best Buy vs Amazon.comMy wife uses strictly for reading books and since it connects to the internet, she can read her email too, and respond.  This Kindle is really nice as loaded her first two books 3 days ago via wi-fi.  The 1280X800 display with back lighting is what my wife marvels over.  She is now a happy camper with her new Kindle and I much prefer working with Amazon.Update:  Only negative is if reading a book all day long, the battery needs recharging that evening.  I would think the battery would last a couple days reading constanly 10 hours a day.

Reviews.Title: kindle is awesome!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Martuccio
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this kindle. Very easy to use and it is super light weight. Very happy with product!  Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle ever!
Reviews.Author: River Shark
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is perfect! Ease of navigation, large screen, plenty of storage. I have downloaded books that were difficult to read on my Kindle Keyboard and they are so much easier to read now. Plus the internet connectivity is awesome.

Reviews.Title: A nice adjunct to my other not so portable devices.
Reviews.Author: David K Ries
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful, portable adjunct to my laptop and desktop systems. Having the capability to surf the net in an under two pound package is great! I also enjoy the ability to read a book (out of many) at the touch of the screen.

Reviews.Title: Super cool
Reviews.Author: Peggy
Reviews.Content: I know this one doesn't have a camera but, I didn't want a camera.  I know it's smaller but, I like that too.  I like to watch Downton Abby on it.

Reviews.Title: Awsome replacement for my origingal Kindle
Reviews.Author: Cecil C. Rhodes
Reviews.Content: Fast response, easy to navigate, have it with me almost all the time.  Like "Silk".  Kindle is faster and better for email and Facebook than my phone.

Reviews.Title: superior clarity
Reviews.Author: Lynn Krogh
Reviews.Content: great for reading, easy to look at.  Some question about battery life.  Great clarity.  Compact.  No case but easy to order on e-Bay and way cheaper than the sale offer price for a case

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: C. Jacques "Chris"
Reviews.Content: I am still trying to work with it as I recieved it a few days ago.  I am looking forward to a long friendship with my Kindle Fire. Everything I like is at my fingertips. Reading a good book, playing games, checking my mail & watching a good movie.  What more could you ask for.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD Meets All My Expectations....Except One
Reviews.Author: S. G. Carcione "aging blonde"
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle. The color and clarity are wonderful. It is quick to load and responsive to my touch. The only disappointment is that it does not include a camera. I did not realize that when I ordered it. Otherwise, it is perfect for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Like it!
Reviews.Author: R. david gateno
Reviews.Content: Its great but what with the ads?Plus, while is charging, does it have a light that change color once is charged like my original Kindle Fire?

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Bradley J. Barenie "Bradley J."
Reviews.Content: My fiance absolutely loves her Kindle Fire!  No one ever has anything bad to say about this product.  I highly recommend the Kindle Fire HD.

Reviews.Title: love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Angela Adkins
Reviews.Content: Love it!!! Really enjoy using this. User friendly!!! Recommend this product to anyone that loves books or just the web!!

Reviews.Title: keep reading!
Reviews.Author: tom "grandpa"
Reviews.Content: everyone needs a kindle.  Bought grandson his first kindle at 9 years old and he loves it.  Reading more than watching TV and that's a good thing!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: darnel chevrette
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my kindle. I used my laptop twice since I got  it. Once just to download music  to the kindle. It's easy to tap into WiFi. And most of the games are free.I'm hooked on the Simpson's tapped out.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Erica Rivera
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for Christmas. The first one we received wouldn't charge fully so I had to contact amazon. They replaced it with no problem. The second one arrived working great. My son loves it and plays his learning games often. Unfortunately the second one dropped once and has a crack in the screen. Would recommend for a toddler/ young kid!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the family
Reviews.Author: K. Littlejohn
Reviews.Content: I spent several weeks researching what tablet to buy that my whole family could enjoy. I had almost decided on an IPad when I read about FreeTime Unlimited for kids offered on the KIndle Fire. I knew then what I wanted to buy. I could not be more pleased with this great tablet and the content available on Freetime Unlimited is amazing amassing hundreds of books, videos and apps. I downloaded a bunch of kid's books to my 5 year old son's account and we were flipping through the home page that shows all of his books and he looked at me and said "A library Mama!". That is exactly what I was hoping for. I know he will love the videos and games but more than anything I want him to have a love of reading and this tablet will help me accomplish that with an incredible library of books at his fingertips. The Kindle Fire HD feels nice and sturdy and well more expensive than it's price. As I move throughout the tablet the pages flow like melted butter, beautifully responsive. I am a long time owner of the original Kindle ereader and I really would not have expected anything less from a Kindle. I am a huge fan. The 7" size of this tablet is great for travel and easy for my son to hold. I expect that it will become my son's KIndle and I will be purchasing another for myself for Christmas. At this price I can own two and still not spend as much as on one IPad.

Reviews.Title: The very Best for Young and Old It wont be long before All are sold.
Reviews.Author: eileen connor
Reviews.Content: It is the best piece of electronic equipment I have had , It has all the bells and whistle that one would need. But is easy to understand and work. I just think there has been a lot of thought put into this kindle Fire. Many thanks and as a traveler it makes life easy it's so small and yet can do so much. Many thanks for all you hard work that helps older people like me.

Reviews.Title: MY DAUGHTER LOVES IT!!!
Reviews.Author: J. Del Campo
Reviews.Content: Was so happy with this purchase! It was a great gift at a great price! My daughter loves the size and the quality. She is a big reader and loves her Kindle. It is a great gift for anyone, as it has lots of other great features!

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE 7" HD DISPLAY 16 GB
Reviews.Author: SPENDERELLA
Reviews.Content: THIS WAS A GIFT TO MYSELF WORTH THE WAIT PEOPLE I GOT TWO GREAT DEALS WITH THIS AND A CASE TO GO WITH IT  DISCOUNT OF $30 AND USED THAT TO BUY MY ACCESSORIES I GUESS  YOU CAN SAY I GOT IT ON AND POPPIN WITH THIS ITEM FROM AMAZON YOU CAN DO THE SAME  THANKS AGAIN AMAZON LUV IT !!

Reviews.Title: I don't dislike it, but it's not great either.
Reviews.Author: K. Russell
Reviews.Content: It doesn't cost much, and it does what I need it to do (which is pretty much read PDF documents, and listen to MP3 downloads), so I'm not complaining too much.  But the downsides to this tablet are clear.It blocks Google apps from being downloaded, which is a big mistake on Amazon's part, but the user can side swipe that with the use of Amazon's Easy Installer app.It has a TON of advertising, and if you choose not to have advertising, you still can't control what appears on your sleep screen.  It's ludicrous, and it doesn't make sense.It provides a MINIMAL amount of storage, and does not allow the user to install micro chips for extra storage.  Of course, the purpose of this is to encourage the user to use Amazon's Cloud storage.  But maybe I don't want Amazon storing my business.  It should be my choice.  So, that's another big error on Amazon's part.  Of course, there are ways to get around this as well.  And a quick Google search is all you need to find out how ;)The Fire definitely has its limitations.  However, it if meets your needs, go for it :)

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: D. Smith
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kindle (third if you count the lemon that it replaced).  I loved my first Kindle, but this one has been very disappointing.  It is an odd size, so it doesn't fit in my case; it won't store my books on the device, and won't let me delete the HUGE dictionaries that I don't want on there; you can't view any videos that require a flash player; customer support has been awful (many hours spent trying to resolve issues; numerous people, most of whom barely speak English, that pass you around to one another; failure to understand the problems, and when they finally DO understand, a lame apology saying they can't fix it).  The next time I think I'm going to spend a little more and get something that isn't so limited in its application, functionality and support.  Shame on Amazon for putting your name on a product like this!!!

Reviews.Title: loved it did not have camera so returned ordered different one
Reviews.Author: jeffrey skiba
Reviews.Content: I loved it, but wanted the camera so went with the 8.9 hdx if you are looking for a reader/tablet and dont care about the camera this is a great buy!  And personally I think the camera quality on the other one sucks, but i do love the bigger screen.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Jennifer L. Harris
Reviews.Content: My young boys received the Kindle Fire for a Christmas gift. They love it and can navigate it with no problems. About 5 months after we got the kindle, it started to shut off for no reason and wouldn't work unless it was plugged it. I contacted customer service and we tried a few things. The representative called me back the next day to check if it was working better and it was not. With no other questions asked she said she would ship a replacement kindle. Amazon makes the return process is a breeze. Within 2 days we received the replacement kindle and so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Elsie "lc"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my 11year old grandson.  He really loves it to play games and read his books.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Free Time is perfect for my 7 year old
Reviews.Author: Aimee Burt
Reviews.Content: Just got this for my 7 year olds birthday.  ABSOLUTELY love it so far.  The Free Time is amazing and works perfectly for our needs.  The content you get from subscribing is well worth the monthly charge!

Reviews.Title: upgraded to the new kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: CJB
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and lightweight....a good purchase.  The old one wouldn't charge so decided to give this one a try.  Happy that I did.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I LOVE IT!!!SECOND GENERATION KINDLE IS ABSOLUTELY PERFECT FOR ME! I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS ONE TO EVERY ONE WHO LOVES TO READ BOOKS ON THEIR KINDLE.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 7" HD
Reviews.Author: Jimmy B. Berry "riverrock"
Reviews.Content: I bought this one as my Kindle Fire was lost. Bought a cover from Staples and at time with the cover on, it will keep powering off. Remove the cover and it works great.  Try putting the cover back on and will work for a while then start powering down again. I guess I should have gotten a cover through Kindle, ever so the one purchased from Staples was a Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: StaringPanda
Reviews.Content: A very good tablet. Very crisp colors and one of the best out in the market. Definitely a worthy purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good hardware
Reviews.Author: Fidel
Reviews.Content: I bought a Kindle Fire HD 7" to fully use jw.org.  I have to say that it's amazing.  It runs smooth with 1 GB of RAM.  It has many pros and a few cons.  If you can live without google services you will love it.

Reviews.Title: Replacement Kindle
Reviews.Author: Marianne Davies
Reviews.Content: It was really worth my old kindle breaking.  The swiftness that it was replaced was great.  The Kindle HD FIre goes forever on a charge and is so much nicer screen.  Thanks again.  I would highly recommend you guys to anyone.

Reviews.Title: My KIndle
Reviews.Author: JONNI KARR
Reviews.Content: My Kindle arrived safe and sound. It seems to be working just great. Always enjoy Kindles and always tell everyone where i purchased them from

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect.
Reviews.Author: Judith L Moritz
Reviews.Content: I could only give my new Kindle Fire HD  a four-star rating. I love the clarity of the screen and smaller size of the Kindle, but when I've bought cases for it (I've bought two), the on/off button is on the back. This makes me remove the Kindle from the case in order to turn it on or off. It's just a small irritation for me. :-)

Reviews.Title: Free Shipping with Amazon Prime!
Reviews.Author: Lourdes Relyea
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my father in law. Easy ordering, they shipped it directly to him in about 2 days, for free!

Reviews.Title: Great Product ---- Superior Customer Service
Reviews.Author: AnnMarie Jones
Reviews.Content: It's a great product. My 11 year old son absolutely loves it and uses it every day for home-work and playtime.Amazon provides the most SUPERIOR products and customer service.Thank youAnnMarie Jones

Reviews.Title: Nice Product
Reviews.Author: Richard W. Burritt
Reviews.Content: Bought as a Christmas gift for my wife. She loves it. Took a little while to learn the new features, because she was overloaded with new technology with other gifts at that time.Convenient for traveling and comfortable to carry.

Reviews.Title: I love the Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: Memom
Reviews.Content: I am so thrilled that a bought this Kindle.The color is so clear. I can take my favorite books and movies with me.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Gordy
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle fire HD 7". Gave my 1st one to my daughter and she also is enjoying it. Great deal!

Reviews.Title: Amazon's OS is terrible, better off with another tablet
Reviews.Author: Pseu1donym
Reviews.Content: Amazon's overlay of Android is so constricting compared to any other mobile device's version of Android. You cannot switch apps easily and Google applications, which come standard with other Android tablets/phones, are not on the market. I received the tablet for free at a raffle drawing but would never have invested any money towards something so poor in OS design. I expected a lot more from Amazon's OS and market, but the product simply isn't there (yet?). Amazon may have a great online presence and fabled workplace environment, but they simply cannot produce a usable OS. The hardware is decent however, and I will look into rooting/flashing custom ROM's for this device. Do not buy this tablet if you didn't understand the previous sentence, it is a waste of your money and you will feel nothing but frustration. However, if you have somewhat of an aptitude towards mobile development, then this is a great investment.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire is definitely worth buying
Reviews.Author: Josie
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire is very useful and great for reading. The display and audio are amazing. This is a great little gadget for the price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent clarity of picture.
Reviews.Author: cathy borner
Reviews.Content: Clarity of picture is excellent.  Had to search for help when learning to use it however.  Seems to take a long time to charge.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Wild Works
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife for a gift and she absolutely love the kindle fire, she carries it with her wherever she goes. we have 2 home PC's and I think the kindle is faster than both of them. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a tablet type device.

Reviews.Title: Kindle 7" HD
Reviews.Author: Julia Burgos
Reviews.Content: i really love the way it fits so easily into my purse or bible carrier because it goes to church with me and I use it during the service to look up and even highlight(!!) scripture. the picture on is clear and sharp. thanks

Reviews.Title: Cant sync calendar
Reviews.Author: John Annoreno
Reviews.Content: If I knew that you could not sync and use the calendar unless you have yahoo mail or gmail I never would have purchased the unit. I spent two hours trying to get the calendar to sync with no luck. I finally called Amazon Tech Support and was informed that the calendar sync and calendar can only be use if you have yahoo mail or gmail.

Reviews.Title: Piece of trash!!
Reviews.Author: Celia Montiglio
Reviews.Content: Traded my old Kindle Fire HD cause it had a cracked screen. Replaced for 99.00 plus tax with a new 2nd gen model. Should have kept the old one with the crack. This one shuts off at any time. Will not boot up, some times. Does not have some of the apps the other one had. NOT HAPPY!!!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Sonya S.
Reviews.Content: This is the best device I've ever purchased! Perfect size to hold in my hand without hurting my wrist or hands, smooth design, access to latest apps and books!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Toni Jackson
Reviews.Content: Not so good, cannot connect to anything even though Kindle says I am connected to my internet service, not happy

Reviews.Title: some what ok
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I really like this kindle but most times it automatically restarts .Sometimes multiple times in a row . Also it likes to close all tabs and does not have a great internet connection . I'm glad I waited for the price to go down but I kind of think I should of waited for a better model to come out . I'm not sure if it's just me but I also find it's way slower then most tablet products out there .

Reviews.Title: Works great.  Good purchase.
Reviews.Author: Mark Gibson "ldsfamily"
Reviews.Content: The only issue I've noticed is that I had purchased the non-advertisement version.  I'm seeing ads on the bottom anyway.  Otherwise, it is a great used purchase and is in great condition.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Great for reading but it is a whole lot more
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Great for viewing at movies, t.v. shows, read magazines, newspapers, and of course books. I was one who always opted for the paper feel, but now I accept that technology led us to this format.

Reviews.Title: Great present for wife
Reviews.Author: John P Lynn
Reviews.Content: Good price and it has worked well.  The shipping was great and well protected.  My wife likes it very much now if I can get her away from the games

Reviews.Title: Very Nice!
Reviews.Author: SusanB
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a friend. They love it. Said they fell asleep with the kindle still in their lap. No complaints. Nice product. Note that the cases for the Kindle Fire (previous generation) will not fit the HD model. Different dimensions, ever so slight. Very nice tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire!!!!
Reviews.Author: THS
Reviews.Content: I am totally pleased with my Kindle Fire HD 7".  I had a regular Kindle for three years.  I wore it out and upgraded to theKindle Fire.  Now I can read with no lights on!  I sent my old Kindle back to Amazon, so the Kindle Fire only cost me $99.00!Money well spent!

Reviews.Title: I Love My Kindle Fire HD!
Reviews.Author: Melissa Roberts
Reviews.Content: My Kindle has been everything and more. It's so much better than my old Kindle. I will highly recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Liked the first one so much, had to get another
Reviews.Author: Carrie Watters
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire for myself when they first came out and liked it so much, I wanted to get something for my kids to use as well.  I purchased a Kindle Fire HD (2013) for my 9year old for Christmas and it has worked out so well for him, we bought this one for my 7year old's birthday (yes, we now have 3).  For a kid-friendly tablet, the Kindle Fire HD is the only way to go.  I was originally going to purchase one of the $60-$80 tablets, but have heard they are more trouble than they are worth.  My 15year old prefers the apple products, but these android based tablets are a much better value.  I have flexibility with the apps, I can link both my younger son's on the same account and they can share games and play together! I personally don't like the apple products and think they are way overpriced, Amazon's Kindle Fire is priced right and well worth the investment!!!

Reviews.Title: Just OK
Reviews.Author: Thomas P. Barnes
Reviews.Content: I have had an ipad 2 for years and wanted to try something new.  The screen resolution is great and I love the browser.  However, it crashes much more often than my iPad.

Reviews.Title: Best Thing I Never Knew I Wanted!
Reviews.Author: Jeni Lill
Reviews.Content: I was a little bit guarded about choosing a Kindle Fire because, let's face it, it's more of a tablet than just a reading device. I enjoyed my Kindle Keyboard because I could focus on ONLY reading with it, but when it finally bit the dust (from overuse) I had to replace it.I am so glad I chose this as my replacement! The HD qualities are amazing, and I love the way it is organized. The touch feature is nice and doesn't require much pressure -- just a light touch. I am sure I will find many more things I love as I get accustomed to this item, but I can't see how it could get much better.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Plus
Reviews.Author: valentina risse
Reviews.Content: I have a Kindle Reader that I love. The Fire is much easier to operate than I expected. This is the next step beyond!

Reviews.Title: more storage needed
Reviews.Author: marie.g@absamail.co.za
Reviews.Content: I already own another 2.  Purchased this one so as to have more storage but find it takes extremely long to download in fact it displays "queued" most of the time eventhough there are no other items being downloaded, then I have a problem to try and retrieve the download.  My husband, daughter and myself use our three alternatively.  I loved my first and second Fire.  Because of geographical areas , being an Amazon Prime member I can only stream and sometimes download video content when in the USA.

Reviews.Title: Great product for a kids-teen but Not so much for adults.
Reviews.Author: Sokhen Nhem
Reviews.Content: Not too many apps or great apps.  Most popular apps/games (i.e. Clash of Clans, flappy bird, Hay Day) were not available for reach - had to go thru a mission to get.  Size is a little too small to be considered a tablet.  Camera has very good quality.  My 11yr loves it though.  Thank you

Reviews.Title: Still learing how to operated
Reviews.Author: Dorothy L Buford
Reviews.Content: Great item and one day I will master the how to op[erated and learn all the thing it can do and so on...

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Patricia Orsua
Reviews.Content: I ordered this unit thinking it came with same features as my kindle fire.  I was disappointed to find that it had no HDMI capability. I ordered for that purpose, otherwise I like this lindle

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: MEEE ""ME""
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle fire.  The books...the games...all of it.  Information at your finger tips. This is my second Fire.  Problem with the charging of the old one...but I think Amazon has improved the connection on the new ones.  I own three Kindled.  A family Kindle...my Fire..an a e-reader for the pool.  Kindle Fires only down fall is the glare in the sun....but where I go...it goes!

Reviews.Title: Kindle FIRE
Reviews.Author: Marva J
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle.  This fits in my purse and I have access to all sorts of things!  Best small investment ever.  I can even download my school books!  I love it.

Reviews.Title: love
Reviews.Author: thborusiewicz
Reviews.Content: this is my second kindle fire and i love it just as much as my first one. can't live without it.

Reviews.Title: Love the Kindle Fire HD so much that I ordered another
Reviews.Author: Ginak49
Reviews.Content: I gave this 5 stars because I purchased it for my mother and she loves it.My mother is 85 years old and was in a rehab hospital recovering and wanted to read books but most of the books are small print. I purchased this for her and now she can read anything she likes and play puzzles and games and check her e-mail. I would recommend this to anyone from 3 years old to 100 years old.

Reviews.Title: Lots of Wi-Fi issues
Reviews.Author: Jerry I. Wilson "Wilson shoes"
Reviews.Content: Device works fine on my home network with high speed internet, but often very difficult or impossible to connect to networks in other locations. Often says it is "Connected" to a network, but if you see a little x at top, you have no network connection which will work. My iPhone connects and works easily, automatically and fully at most outside hot spots, but not the Kindle which works at very few outside hot spots. Amazon says it's not a Kindle design problem and is actually a problem with the hot spot, but cannot explain why my iPhone can connect so easily and quickly to an outside hot spot where Kindle will not. This is my third Kindle and each had the same problem. Storage also fills up quickly with just a few games. And often cannot open e-mails; get error message saying "Too many open tabs", whatever that means. But, for the price, great customer service which Amazon is known for, and Prime, it beats the competition.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THE KINDLE FIRE HD X, you should too because....
Reviews.Author: Madame L. Yoko Yagami
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle fire HD X! It's fast,easy to use,and since its made by Amazon shopping is a cinch! This was made for the user in mind unlike the overpriced IPad where it's more likely bought for the brand,My kindle is resourceful and has parent controls (for the overprotective parent) so your child isn't off literally buying garbage.You can also block pictures,web,docs,music, etc  so they can't access it at all.But more about the fun stuff.Get special offer and you get,500 coins for the apps store ($5.00) Prime for a month,and I can't remember but other cool stuff.But it might not have apps like the Apple app's store but that doesn't mean it doesn't have fun ones.BTW love the Facebook app. Well this is all I must say for now :) It has tons more but don't ask me JUST GET IT!!!!

Reviews.Title: Beware Version Changes!
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: I got this kindle to replace the same model that had broke so that I could use my $40 case.  I even skipped buying a newer model for this reason.  When I got the new Kindle it was a different shape.  I called customer service and the girl had no idea why the two exact same models were different.  I even used the same product number from my amazon history.  It was two days later that I got an email explaining that the Kindle was the same model but a DIFFERENT VERSION?  They also had links to covers I could buy that would work.  Had I known this I would have bought a better kindle.  This is my 4th kindle, although I will continue to use kindles I'm now stuck with an older slower version.

Reviews.Title: Worthless piece of crap
Reviews.Author: Tammi Warrington
Reviews.Content: I have had nothing but trouble with the Kindle Fire HD that I bought directly from Amazon. I am on my second one under warranty that doesn't work. I asked for a return of the money I paid instead of a "new" Kindle and was told they would refund 80% of the purchase price once I returned the Kindle: $151.99. I paid $259.30 for the Kindle and the warranty and have had nothing but trouble and inconvenience with it. Additionally, I bought an Armorbox and apps for it that can't be returned. I am supposed to deal with a crappy product AND be out over $100 because they can't produce a machine that works properly. THIS IS DISGUSTING AMAZON! DON'T BUY!!!!!!Update: After talking to a supervisor with Amazon regarding the overall experience, they agreed to refund me in full once they receive the Kindle back. I still wouldn't buy another Kindle, but my faith is restored in Amazon's customer service once I get the refund.

Books from old kindle did not all transfer like they should have and now am forced to go through the collections one by one to determine what's missing.  When charging, there is no indicator light to show when it is fully charged as there was on the older kindle.  I do not find any value in the "special offers", which are basically ads, and hope the price did not include that.  Like the fact that I can use it for other things besides reading however need to figure out how to manage the books before I get into other stuff.  Wish it had a camera so could use for skype.  Price was good.  It is, however, always a pleasure working with Amazon customer service, which I definitely cannot say about other places I shop, either on line or in person!

Reviews.Content: How could you not love a Kindle Fire?!  I got this one this week when my first generation KF could no longer charge due to the usb port problem associated with it. Reviews.Content: I like the HD but was very disappointed that my Kindle Fire would not take a charge. This caused us to have to purchase the Kindle HD.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet I ever brought for my family
Reviews.Author: Nahimana
Reviews.Content: I recommend this for any parent. I got it especially for my two Autistic children and because the tablet came with the Kindle Fire Free Time program, it has been amazing for them. There is no tablet out there with this kind of program. Before you purchase, make sure you read everything on the page, some tablets come with "special offers", I chose a Wi-Fi 16GB 7" Kindle Fire HD with NO special offers. Yes you might pay extra, but I can't stand a lot of ads. There are so many on cable, online, on radio, even on cell phones, its ridiculous. Plus the Free Time program while your child is using it, if by any chance the app came with an ad, you can have a peace of mind because the program blocks any connection the ads come with and your child can continue playing with no interruptions. Amazon offers lots of free child apps too, I would say better than windows. Of course, if you want full version, you got to pay and its not a lot.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: William Becker
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd kindle.  The first one had a red or green light letting me know if it was fully charged or not, this one does not.  When playing word, if a word is not acceptable, the notification comes up too dark to read which is an issue when you play a word alongside another so you don't know which combination doesn't work.  When accessing Facebook, the print is so miniscule that one wonders why it even starts out so small; start with normal print size and expand if needed from there.  And while the keyboard is easier to type on, the message seems to send in the middle of a sentence, not sure how or why but presumably when I hit the space bar, I'm also somehow able to send when I don't want to.  All in all, this "new and better" kindle is not improved and I miss my old one which lost connection with charger, another reason for the red/green light!! Perhaps a 4 star rating was too high.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: Kay Ashby
Reviews.Content: I am in love with my kindle fire! I love to read and am always at some book store or the library....now I have all that I need within my kindle!!

Reviews.Title: Just Got I
Reviews.Author: Judi Spencer
Reviews.Content: Just received my new Kindle Fire.  A dear friend told me that I would really enjoy ie and she was so right!  I love the Reader and several other things are proving interesting as well.  I also would recommend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: On my 3rd Kindle
Reviews.Author: Renee Wiley
Reviews.Content: My third Kindle just died.  For me it's always the same thing...the battery won't hold a charge.  No, it's not the charger.  If my husband hadn't bought the warranty I would be sol.  I love the Kindle and haven't had many other problems except it won't play videos from YouTube sometimes.  Always get the warranty even though it is expensive.  You will need it.

Reviews.Title: Nice Tablet
Reviews.Author: John Nagle
Reviews.Content: This tablet was recommended to me by an acquaintance, so I looked over all the reviews.  It had a high rating, and I went ahead and purchased it.  It's a good price, is easy to operate and works very well.  I had read one review that had given it a low rating because it was just really a device manufactured to purchase stuff on Amazon.  Although, this is true, I think that it's easy to use and would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: cameron ballard
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter and she loves it. You practically have to pry her away from it. I have used many different tablets and this is ranked among the better. My only wish is it had more memory.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my DIL.  She had one previously but sold it.  She was very happy to get another one.

Reviews.Title: My Grandson loved it!
Reviews.Author: Carolyn A Mudd "Carrie"
Reviews.Content: He's four going on 5 and this is so perfect for safe internet games for his age as well as books and more!  It's all you ever need!Loved the Kindle so much ; I bought one for myself!

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUY
Reviews.Author: greta engdahl "GRETA ENGDAHL"
Reviews.Content: I RECIEVED MY ITEM WAY BEFORE I WAS TOLD IT WOULD GET HERE. LOVE IT! WAS ABLE TO USE IT ALMOST RIGHT ALWAY. I WILL BUY FROM THIS PLACE AGAIN IF NEED BE.

Reviews.Title: works great and love it
Reviews.Author: W. Stupi "bills13"
Reviews.Content: i have been using it from the time i got it i have no problems with it and it works great

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7 review
Reviews.Author: gloria davenport
Reviews.Content: Very nice and easy to operate for a non-techie like me.  I'm thinking of upgrading so that I can have a camera.  I've read a couple of books and also use the bible at church.  It's perfect.  I use it for almost everything I used my laptop for.

Reviews.Title: Son's belated Christmas present
Reviews.Author: Farley
Reviews.Content: I got this for my son, and he enjoys it so much. He would have his nose stuck in it all day, if I would let him!

Reviews.Title: Perfect gift for my mother
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Rcadianne"
Reviews.Content: My mother LOVES her Kindle! My sister and I bought it as a Christmas gift for her. It was simple for my sister to set it up for her and she uses it all the time. She is especially excited to download books and read them right away! She doesn't do much with the internet capabilities, although we introduced her to Pinterest this last week!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Arthur Miller
Reviews.Content: A fast processor, the great variety of apps, an HD display, and outstanding Wi-Fi make this tablet a great value.  An HDMI port would've made it perfect.

Reviews.Title: Best gift ever
Reviews.Author: Dolores Mohr
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HD. It was a gift for Christmas and I was not exactly excited until I started using it.  Now I am going to be giving it as a gift myself.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Patricia Rourk
Reviews.Content: My Granddaughter loves her Kindle. She is on it all the time,very thoght it has a  small screen she watches nextflix on it.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for your kids
Reviews.Author: schees1
Reviews.Content: Awesome basic Kindle tablet for middle school aged children, without spending hundreds of $$$$. Most needed apps are free, and great to get the kids reading.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: speekeazy
Reviews.Content: My son has really taken the kindle. I was concerned, since he has seen me with an I PAD, however, he really likes it and says he prefers his kindle. I am glad I made the purchase.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: Bonnie C Chumney
Reviews.Content: I am truly enjoying my Kindle Fire HD 7".  It works great in all areas.  I love that I can carry my library around with me.  lol

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Doris Free
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire HD has a large display screen which makes it great for reading books, playing games, with bright color.  Wi-Fi allows easy downloading of books or games or facebook activities.  It's very lightweight too.All ages can use this Kindle Fire HD.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HD
Reviews.Author: inedwo
Reviews.Content: I had the first edition of the Kindle Fire, which after a bit over 2 years would not charge.  I purchased this one and I am very pleased with it.  It is fast, easy to read and I love it.  Took it on an airplane flight and could read or do puzzles and it easily fit into my purse.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet
Reviews.Author: e landsman
Reviews.Content: Awesome tablet!!  Got this for my 8 year old on his birthday.  Free reel time is wonderful, it lets you limit the amount of screen time also you can set daily reading goals for your child and they can see their progress.  Would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Able to continue reading!  :)
Reviews.Author: Ellen Yamamura
Reviews.Content: I’m really enjoying my refurbished Kindle Fire HD 7”.  I’m just not sure if all the books I purchased for my 2nd Kindle Fire got transferred onto the 3rd Kindle Fire.  I know that not all my aps were.

Reviews.Title: Love the Kindle
Reviews.Author: dadzattic
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my daughter, who uses it daily since she got it a month ago.  I gave one as a gift to my wife 1.5 years ago, and she uses it everyday.  Love the Kindle !!  Has many features that neither even uses, but at least they're there.  HD is great.  New daily habit :)

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7''
Reviews.Author: Queenmstee
Reviews.Content: Love the easy-to-use home page and Appstore...I would recommend this product to my family and friends. I Would purchase again

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: I Love Amazon
Reviews.Content: It's definitely not an iphone or android type device. There is a lot of technical glitches like, if you back out of the alarm while your testing it, it will keep ringing and ringing. I mean, there is nothing seriously annoying from what i have noticed, and for the price it is worth it is an awesome buy. I like it :)

Reviews.Title: I give this product five stars because of how compact it was. I liked it because it served it's purpose as a gift give away at m
Reviews.Author: Wildgeyser
Reviews.Content: I give this product five stars because of how compact it was. I liked it because it served it's purpose as a gift give away at my company. I recommend this product to everybody.

Reviews.Title: New kindle fire
Reviews.Author: cheryl
Reviews.Content: It is wonderful. I use it everyday and I am downloading games and books! Thank you. Best money I ever spent

Reviews.Title: So far, so good.
Reviews.Author: Joan Hall
Reviews.Content: So far, my refurb Kindle has been working very well, but I have only had it for a couple months.  My original Kindle lasted just over a year before it crashed and wouldn't turn back on.

Reviews.Title: i love my kindle
Reviews.Author: Ellen Cardin
Reviews.Content: I mainly purchased my kindle to read and save shipping.  The books I want to read are the same as if I was ordering online and paying for shipping.  Not saving anything there but I like the rest of the downloads I use.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire HD Rocks
Reviews.Author: David D.
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my Kindle Fire HD. It arrived in a very timely manner. The only challenge I found was the lack of operating and set up instructions. It would have been very helpful to have a starting point on the learning curve.Overall, I am please with my Kindle and learning more about its operation.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: L. Trombley
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 11 year old granddaughter, she loves it.It is easy to use, color and graphics are sharp & clear and itis affordable.....I was very impressed and am thinking about buying another one!

Reviews.Title: Its a great tablet, without breaking the bank!
Reviews.Author: Cameron Just
Reviews.Content: This is a great little tablet, it has apps, games, prime, web browsing, calendar, contacts etc., Everything one would look for in a decent tablet. Its very easy to use, my 5 year old daughter uses it much more than I do. And I could have spent much more, but this does everything I need it to.

Reviews.Title: Wasted money on two kindles
Reviews.Author: Brian Salata
Reviews.Content: I have two kids and purchased two kindles for Christmas presents. Four months later, both kindles won't charge. First, the charger that came with it stopped working, then I charged for about a month on my phone charger, stopped working. Moved the USB cable from my phone charger to the amazon kindle charger base and that worked for a week. Then I went out and bought a brand new one this week. It worked! for a day... no longer charges the kindles since the next day. I've googled this problem and am disgusted that this is common. I thought I bought a quality product because amazon has it's name on it... Just google amazon kindle problems and you will see that how low quality the Fire HD is. I guess you get for what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: My daughter LOVES her Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Melanie R. Betonte
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle Fire for my daughter's birthday gift and it was so much more than she expected.  She had looked at other tablets and for the exceptional price was delighted with all of the benefits and attributes that the Kindle has to offer.  She was very impressed and remains very happy and satisfied with the quality and ease of use of the Kindle Fire.  The next one I buy will be for me!

Reviews.Title: New Kindle
Reviews.Author: Debra G. Hatfield
Reviews.Content: Love the new Kindle HD.  It allows me to take books anywhere easily as well as allowing me to get my e-mail and Facebook pages.

Reviews.Title: Just Like New
Reviews.Author: John E. Scott
Reviews.Content: Have owned a Kindle eReader for about a year and decided to upgrade.  Bought a refurbished Kindle Fire HD and it is wonderful.  Same guarantee as new one and a great saving.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful gift for my hubby!
Reviews.Author: L
Reviews.Content: For someone who loves to read this is a must --- great size, great quality, very easy to use and when hooked with a Prime membership so many free options to download!

Reviews.Title: My Kindle
Reviews.Author: Virginia Griffin
Reviews.Content: I really like the Kindle but I wish I had a bigger screen.Good sound and screen is clear, picture is really good.I do recommend all the time.

Reviews.Title: I absolutely love my Kindle!!!!
Reviews.Author: carol Goss
Reviews.Content: I bought the kindle so I could take it in my room and watch movies and tv shows because I don't have cable tv. It is the best for . movies, shows and games as well. The pictures are crystal clear the sound is wonderfully loud enough to hear it without it being right upon on my face> I also love that I can do everything I need to do on the web so I can take it with me and hook up to wifi to check emails and check facebook. The web pages load fast. even faster than my old laptop. I don't have anything bad to say about this tablet, it works for me and im happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7", HD Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Trev
Reviews.Content: I am really happy with my Fire HD; I'm on the move a lot, and thought it wonderful that I could have not only my books, but audio books as well, and when I saw that you could have movies too!! well, that was me also.Unfortunately, the only downside of my purchase was the fact that I live in New Zealand, and no where on the Amazon Instant Video site, did it say that Amazon is no longer licenced to sell outside of the US.. bitterly disapointed, and felt a bit duped, but beggers can't be choosers.. I'll just stick with my audio books.Beware buyers from outside the US - you cannot watch movies, videos or tv programmes as their hype goes

Reviews.Title: great product & service
Reviews.Author: Roxanna
Reviews.Content: its wonderful I have had plenty of apps downloaded along with music and pictures this thing has so much memory and long battery life

Reviews.Title: I'm in love
Reviews.Author: Harriet E Fontenot
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire.  It does everything I want it to do and I can still read my books on it.  I use it more than my computer now and my grandsons fight over who gets it first.  Best purchase I've made in a long time.

Reviews.Title: Must have
Reviews.Author: Ambam
Reviews.Content: There is nothing that can beat the quality of a kindle. My first gen lasted through 2 years and 3 kids fighting over it and is still going so strong I re-gifted it like new. I bought all three kids their own this time and I am pleased to say they are the only tablet to have around kids and I even had a Galaxy 7 in that I would never let them touch for fear of planetary melt down. Kindle have the right OS and programming to make them very easy to use while the quality of construction give you peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Sarah Koperski
Reviews.Content: We have enjoyed using the kindle fire.  It is fairly easy to use and light weight.  The colors are vibrant and it's nice to have so many options as to what you can do with it.

Reviews.Title: Great product...well worth the cost!
Reviews.Author: Dan Shaw
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fie HD was indeed to set up.  When product arrived it was partially charged and fully active.  After online registration, my wife and I began the clearly defined process of setting up email accounts, printing authorities and downloading apps.  The process was quick and easy.  My wife was playing her favorite games, reading emails ,searching numerous apps and downloading new books with ease.  We were pleased with the bright screen, the quickness of the Kindles operating systems and the ease by which we moved from component to download to reading or audible books.  It was well worth the investment and my wife has found opportunities to use the Kindle several times a day.  Just a terrific investment.  We do wish the battery life was a little longer, but have developed a routine  which provides time to recharge easily during the day and it's always ready to use..

Reviews.Title: my kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Hope Owens
Reviews.Content: I love my new kindles and use them daily. My husband and I play games, check email, read news, and pay bills. The only negative thing I can say about the kindle is that it gets hot at times when using.LOVE MY KINDLE

Reviews.Title: My New KIndle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: elusivehallie
Reviews.Content: I love this gadget - plus Amazon put it on a payment plan, otherwise I don't know if I could have afforded it.  I was still using one of the original Kindles (which I think I paid about $200 for at that time) just for reading books.  My whole family has been trying this out and I will be ordering two more for my granddaughters for Christmas.  The touch screen is awesome and I am getting lots of great book deals. Great product, great service - when I received the  Kindle, Amazon had already registered it as my "second Kindle" and  I received it in less than 36 hours with my Prime account. well worth it. Great price! Thanks again.'

Reviews.Title: Got this for my son- he loves it
Reviews.Author: Artprof67
Reviews.Content: My son wanted to play minecraft, and after searching for iPod touches- another Mom told me that her son played it on a Kindle. Well, perfect! The kindle was less money, and it promotes reading! Win/win.

Reviews.Title: BEST READER EVER
Reviews.Author: Jorge Herrera
Reviews.Content: GREAT! Can't live with out it!  My last Fire is almost dead so I hace ti replaced Android this is a nice replacement. No regrets, in fact flor mi is tve best e-reder in market and as table it's best solution on price-benefits

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Janice A. King "jaking"
Reviews.Content: love the kindle fire next generation.  it is so much advanced from my first kindle fire that I am still trying to learn all it will do

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: Janiann
Reviews.Content: After my original Kindle died, I ordered this one and I am delighted with it. Set up was simple and in a couple of hours I was ready to get back to reading with all of my books quickly transferred to my new Kindle. Access to the Web and email was a bonus.

Reviews.Title: Certified Refurbished Kindle Fire 7" Tablet, Now in HD 7" HD Display, Wi-Fi, 8GB or 16GB
Reviews.Author: booklover
Reviews.Content: So far it is working.  But when I am in the middle of reading, it freezes.  I had to reboot.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Olumide
Reviews.Content: This device is great based on it's price. It's fast, fluid, and overall great. I would rate it 5 stars, but the Kindle Fire HD still has some bugs to work out.ConsSometimes, the device does not turn on when I try to turn it on. The Kindle Fire HD also freezes. Sometimes, the sound glitches. The Kindle Fire HD's internet may have errors. The device is basically based off of Amazon Prime. The screenshot quality is horrible. The Amazon Appstore lacks apps including Instagram, Furby, Beats Music, and more.ProsThe device is fast. The Kindle Fire HD has admirable looks. It can sync with the Amazon Fire TV. It has exclusive content. The new Kindle Fire HD has the newest version of Fire OS. Apps can be downloaded from the internet. The device comes with Dolby Digital 5.1. The Kindle Fire HD comes with 500 Amazon coins for the Amazon Appstore. The device has a low price. A paid app becomes free every day in the Amazon Appstore.

Reviews.Title: Just What I'd Hoped For
Reviews.Author: Jim R. Coplen
Reviews.Content: So far this little beauty is all it was proposed to be. No problems to date, but I'm still trying to figure it out completely.

Reviews.Title: another gift
Reviews.Author: Deborah Edwards
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time and my boss loves it!!! she need something to send and receive emails and it provided just that in a carry around form and easy to teach her how to use it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7" is one of the best gifts I have received !
Reviews.Author: mary
Reviews.Content: I like the wireless, the one-click purchase, the good prices on good reads, and the local lending library capability !Don't have much time for the games...& couldn't print the Kindle Fire directions, but will work it out !  AND I can take it anywhere !

Reviews.Title: nice product
Reviews.Author: Joshua Bailey
Reviews.Content: Fast browser. Easy to hold. Love the lending library for prime members. My leather origami case should be here soon.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Pilar Arsenec
Reviews.Content: I was on the fence about purchasing a Kindle Fire since I already had a Kindle. But, I'm so glad I went ahead and purchased this Kindle Fire because watching videos and movies are them are by far the best experience ever. I love my Kindle Fire and highly recommend it.
